channel.id: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: Prestige Pawnbrokers boss James Constantinou has his work cut out sealing a deal with a pushy young entrepreneur who wants to borrow £100,000 against his Lamborghini, while there's a shock in store for film director Ken Russell's ex-wife Hetty when she brings in a collection of family photographs. A married couple become emotional as they look to pawn a large painting, a mum-of-three parts with her mother's diamond ring to support her kids, and long-term client Tauren risks losing his prized set of designer watches by falling behind on his loan repayments.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: Former model Cathy brings in her collection of designer bags and jewellery, hoping to secure a £50,000 loan to help her launch a lingerie business, while Prestige boss James Constantinou attracts unwanted attention when he goes for a spin in a client's Ferrari. A woman wants to pawn her grandfather's First World War medals to raise money for her mother's funeral, and an inventor decides to part with his precious watch.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp tries to find a peaceful North Yorkshire home for Susanna and Phil, an unconventional couple with a complementary health therapy business. Also in the region, Phil Spencer helps Trudie and Steve and their two sons, who are relocating from Edinburgh to be nearer their relatives.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J Cloobeck, chairman and CEO of hotel company Diamond Resorts International, becomes the first boss to go incognito at his own organisation for a second time.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: The CEO and chairman of in-store media provider Mood Media, Lorne Abony, goes undercover in one of the fastest growing companies in America. Adopting a disguise in his own business, he finds out how efficiently it is functioning.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B owners meet for the last time, with Fay and Ray from Shiralee B&B wanting to find out why David and Donna were so critical of their cleanliness. The group members continue to air their grievances as they find out what they've been paid, before the winner is revealed.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Hunting enthusiast Hunni Hindley hosts the first party in Lincoln, basing it on a murder-mystery theme and concocting an unconventional menu in the hope of landing the £1,000 prize. There is a heated debate on hunting, and the other guests provide interesting discourse including Ricky Summers-Calvert, who has a revelation to make about his acting career.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Medical supplier Caroline Bevis hosts the second dinner party in Lincoln, hoping her Roaring Twenties-themed evening, including black-bottom Betty torte with beetroot ice-cream, will secure her the £1,000 prize.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Insurance underwriter Glenn Priestly hosts the third dinner party from Lincoln, and hopes his theme of rock music legends will win over his guests. However, the tone of the evening is lowered by student Richard Summers-Calvert's inappropriate questions.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Bodybuilding drama student Richard Summers-Calvert hosts the fourth party of the week from Lincoln. He serves chicken and rice for his starter, main and dessert, but with a few twists, and entertains his guests with a game of charades after asking them to dress up as action heroes.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: All-American mother and former barrister Natashka Ingham hosts the final dinner party from Lincolnshire, and hopes to impress her guests with a theme of The Great American Dream. Her dishes include `fall off your horse black bottom pie' and `cow tail pie' and, despite the fact conversation turns to underpants and toilets, she hopes to have done enough to win the £1,000 cash prize.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer revisit a Norwich couple who were worried about stepping on to the property ladder after being dissuaded by surveys. The property gurus also check on the progress of an extended family from Sutton Coldfield who wanted one big house, but could not agree where to live.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Ben Hillman shows a number of properties to newly engaged Glasgow couple Lyndsey and Paul, who want to buy a holiday home in the area around Oliva in eastern Spain.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp tries to find a peaceful North Yorkshire home for Susanna and Phil, an unconventional couple with a complementary health therapy business. Also in the region, Phil Spencer helps Trudie and Steve and their two sons, who are relocating from Edinburgh to be nearer their relatives.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help two couples house-hunting in north-west London. Tony and Michelle have already looked at almost 100 properties during their search for a £900,000 dream pad with enough space for their large record collection. Meanwhile, Amy and Takbir are desperate to get on the first rung of the ladder, but despite some military-style planning, have had no success in the competitive market.(n)

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: The return of the programme following the emergency services, this time focusing on the work of the police, paramedics and fire service in Wiltshire. The first edition examines the rise in racially aggravated hate crimes, with the mother of a nine-year-old girl calling 999 to report that her daughter has been racially abused by two 11-year-olds while out playing. PC James Isaac arrests a 29-year-old man who targeted a 17-year-old white girl with text messages after coming across photos of her and her black boyfriend on Facebook.(n)

programme.title: Britain's Benefit Tenants
programme.desc: Documentary following the work of specialist letting agencies dealing with benefit tenants who have turned to private landlords. In Leeds, letting agent Aimee has received complaints about a bad smell and a high volume of bluebottles coming from one of her properties. For South Yorkshire agents Andrew and Allen, rent arrears have reached an all-time high, forcing them to come up with a controversial way to bring in more money.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The best and funniest moments from the recent series, including armchair TV reviews of Culinary Genius, Britain's Got Talent, Line of Duty, Cruising with Jane McDonald, University Challenge and First Dates. Plus, news reports featuring Diane Abbott, squirrels and young children gate-crashing a serious interview.(n)

programme.title: Bear About the House: Living with My Supersized Pet
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the relationship between people and their exotic and potentially dangerous pets, including a seven-foot Russian bear who regularly has meals with his owners. Minnesota couple Mike and Valerie keep a one-ton buffalo that has to be showered in a car wash and goes on nights out to the local bar.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Divorcee Jane wants to find a suitable partner for her son Bobby, and also a new romantic interest for herself, while maths teacher Paul's love of logic and equations is lost on financial advisor Sophie. Barber Lee has suffered from nerves all of his life and can't believe his luck when he's matched with 24-year-old nurse Abigail, but he forgets her name and has an unfortunate accident in the toilets.(n)

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: First-time parents Rochalla and her unflappable partner Craig arrive 10 days overdue. Her shock pregnancy defied medical odds as she conceived just weeks after an aggressive course of chemotherapy. Cameras also follow train driver Kieron and his wife Joanne, who find it hard to kick their clockwatching habit during labour. While self-confessed ladies' man Michael and partner Natalia prepare for the arrival of her fourth child.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: An 80-year-old patient is admitted suffering from pain in her chest, arm and jaw, and consultant Sarah is concerned that Joan's heart is struggling and requests an urgent blood test and heart. Meanwhile a 26-year-old woman who fell and hit her head during a hen party in Ibiza complains about headaches, dizziness and vomiting, with doctors fearing she may have caused serious damage.(n)

programme.title: 60 Days in Jail
programme.desc: Criminal justice student Dion is the last volunteer to enter the jail and all eight of the undercover inmates must now face up to the harsh reality of life behind bars.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at Shiralee Bed & Breakfast in Salisbury, run by Fay Lahiani and her partner Ray Cooper, where some guests are shocked by the colourful and cluttered decor, while the presence of CCTV cameras also causes concern.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: At The Bluebell Woods in Northampton, David and Donna Bletsoe Brown try to bring a touch of class to their woodland B&B, but Fay Lahiani and Ray Cooper are on the warpath and are quick to discover a mucky mattress. Meanwhile, Marc Harris and Wayne Williams reveal their competitive streak during an afternoon of horse riding.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants travel to The Lion Hotel in Pontypool for the third day of the contest, where manager Marc Harris and head chef Wayne Williams aim to deliver a high end service. Although some of the guests are impressed by the rooms, Ray and Fay find it too small for the price, and simmering tensions between some of the competitors leads to a clash over dinner. At breakfast, Wayne's food comes under fire, but it is David and Donna's feedback about finding a nail in their room that really rattles their hosts.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final guest house of the week is the New Inn, Talgarth, where ex-naval officer Damon Lewis is the sole captain of his ship. Wayne and Marc are determined to be brutally honest, and Donna and David are forced to work closely with their rivals Fay and Ray during an afternoon team-building exercise. Over dinner, Damon admits that taking on the B&B, pub and restaurant all by himself may have not been the best decision - as proved when he has trouble running a solo breakfast service.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B owners meet for the last time, with Fay and Ray from Shiralee B&B wanting to find out why David and Donna were so critical of their cleanliness. The group members continue to air their grievances as they find out what they've been paid, before the winner is revealed.(n)

programme.title: Tried and Tasted: The Ultimate Shopping List
programme.desc: Michel Roux Jr is joined around the tasting table by First Dates maitre d' Fred Sirieix, food writer William Sitwell, baker and deli owner Stacie Stewart and TV presenter Lucy Alexander to put tea, croissants and barbecue pork ribs to the test. The quickfire public taste challenge involves rice pudding.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Andy Wirth - the CEO of a California ski resort - goes undercover to learn more about his company's working practices as he prepares to merge an existing operation with a new acquisition.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jeff Platt, the President and CEO of entertainment and fitness business Sky Zone, poses as a contestant on a reality TV show who is trying to win an action-adventure holiday. He aims to discover whether his fast-growing company is running as smoothly and efficiently as possible, but his secret identity is jeopardised when he encounters a colleague he has met on a previous occasion.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Kat Cole goes undercover among the workforce of her company Cinnabon Incorporated, which serves sweet treats from more than 900 bakeries in 40 countries worldwide. Kat has come a long way after being raised by a single mother who fed her family of three girls on $10 a week. She seeks advice from her old boss, former Hooters CEO Coby Brooks, who also went undercover, in his own organisation. Kat has some lofty goals for Cinnabon to become a worldwide food brand, and wants to make sure that the new products she has put in place are working before she implements her plans.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J Cloobeck, chairman and CEO of hotel company Diamond Resorts International, becomes the first boss to go incognito at his own organisation for a second time.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: The CEO and chairman of in-store media provider Mood Media, Lorne Abony, goes undercover in one of the fastest growing companies in America. Adopting a disguise in his own business, he finds out how efficiently it is functioning.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads for West Babylon, New York, to help the inexperienced owners of restaurant Classic American deal with their escalating debts. The chef struggles to cope with disorganised staff and an unappealing menu, but quickly realises the real problem lies in the kitchen, where a lack of leadership and communication is causing serious trouble.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay checks in to Connecticut's oldest inn, the Curtis House in Woodbury, which has been owned by the Hardisty family for generations. However, the business has started to fall apart and their legacy is on the brink of being lost. Siblings Chris and TJ, who are in charge, no longer speak to each other and the staff and guests feel stuck in the middle.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Pipestone, Minnesota, where he checks in to Historic Calumet Inn. Joint owners Vanda and Rina Smrkovski were given the hotel as a gift by their father, but after just nine months in charge, their staff are on the brink of revolt, and guests are expressing their dissatisfaction with the accommodation. Gordon quickly realises the sisters need to grow up fast if he's going to have a chance of saving the business. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A dachshund is brought in by owners Kelly and Daniel to see if anything can be done to repair a deformity in its foot, and Noel Fitzpatrick gives the one-year-old a lesson in doggy discipline along the way. A 10-month-old labrador needs a hip replacement before it can begin training as a medical-alert dog to help its owner with her rare health condition. An eight-year-old shih-tzu has the most extraordinary walk the vet has ever seen, but the operation to fix the dog's spine will be extremely risky, presenting the owners with an agonising decision.(n)

programme.title: Dance Moms
programme.desc: A huge fight between the dance moms turns Kelly's birthday party into a disaster. Leslie returns and proves she will do anything to get her daughter a solo.(n)

programme.desc: A serious injury threatens Paige's dance career. Meanwhile, Maddie lands a dream role and Jill and Kendall shock the troupe when they return.(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Red thinks the boys are getting soft, so he decides to toughen them up by taking them on a hunting trip - whether they like it or not. Nostalgic comedy, starring Kurtwood Smith and Topher Grace.(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Red finds a new job as a supervisor at the local supermarket, but the money is not much to write home about. Meanwhile, Kelso tries to break up with Laurie because she wants a more permanent relationship. Starring Kurtwood Smith, Ashton Kutcher and Debra Jo Rupp.(n)

programme.title: Wayne's World 2
programme.desc: Heavy metal fanatics Wayne and Garth try to stage a giant Woodstock-style rock festival, with a little help from a spaced-out British roadie and the ghost of Jim Morrison. programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away

programme.desc: The Chimpanzee beneficiaries of Sandy's Tree Dome pay her a visit to inspect her latest inventions. However, Sandy may have to leave Bikini Bottom if they are not impressed.(n)

Australian drama, starring Pamela Rabe, Nicole da Silva and Danielle Cormack.(n)

programme.title: 100 Per Cent Hotter
programme.desc: The team of fashion experts advise busy mum Daniella, who arrives in a red PVC number that leaves little to the imagination. They are also consulted by John, who admits that all creativity goes into his drag alter ego Ava, leaving himself looking drab and plain.(n)

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Rory realises she is not cut out for casual dating and tells Logan she thinks they should go back to being friends, but he surprises her by suggesting they become a couple instead. Luke fills in as head chef, but a pregnant Sookie dislikes having someone else on her turf.(n)

Family comedy, starring Macaulay Culkin, Ted Danson, Glenne Headly and Hector Elizondo.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: After almost eight weeks, Emma Willis reveals the result of the public vote to choose the winner of Big Brother 2017. Whittling them down one by one, Emma leads the runners-up quickly through the best and worst of their time on Big Brother, until there is only one remaining. She chats to the winner about life in the house, why they think they have won and how it feels to be back in the outside world. There'll also be a roll-call of all the evictees from the series and a speedy look at what the housemates got up to yesterday. And fans needn't worry - the normal series may be over for another year, but Celebrity Big Brother promises to return soon.(n)

Comedy sequel, starring Martin Lawrence, Nia Long and Emily Procter.(n)

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: The naive survivors of an apparent ecological disaster work, rest and play inside their utopian sealed community in the year 2019, each hoping to win a ticket to an idyllic island in a regular lottery draw. However, a curious inhabitant discovers the restricted society is a facade shielding a sinister cloning operation and is determined to escape. Sci-fi thriller, starring Ewan McGregor, Scarlett Johansson, Sean Bean and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: A disillusioned office worker grows weary of his humdrum existence, but after meeting the mysterious Tyler Durden he finds fulfilment in establishing a club where similarly frustrated men come to vent their anger in bouts of bare-knuckle fighting. Satirical drama, directed by David Fincher, starring Edward Norton, Brad Pitt, Helena Bonham Carter, Meat Loaf and Jared Leto.(n)

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Ben Stiller directs and stars in this satire on the fashion industry as the eponymous Zoolander, an air-head male model who's eclipsed by the equally vacuous Owen Wilson. But fashion designer Will Ferrell has plans for the ex-model - he's going to turn him into an international assassin!(n)

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: Long-time friends---one a Catholic priest, one a rabbi---reunite with an old friend who becomes the object of both their desires. Trouble brews when one of them is in danger of becoming a third wheel(n)

programme.title: All the President's Men
programme.desc: A powerful reconstruction of the Watergate investigation which led to the most sensational political scandal of the 1970s. Introduced by Brian Reddin(n)

programme.title: Corrina, Corrina
programme.desc: As Corrina draws Molly out of her shell, so Manny falls in love with her, but in 50s America, inter-racial relationships are still frowned on and the pair face prejudice from all sides as their relationship blossoms. The newcomer is a housekeeper-cum-nanny whose personality makes up for her want of domestic skills, but she is black, while Manny and his daughter are white, and in 1959 America the neighbours take a dim view of their blossoming relationship(n)

programme.title: Monster's Ball
programme.desc: Halle Berry's Oscar-winning performance highlights this wrenching tale about racism, redemption and the power of love. She plays a poor Southerner who falls for a prison guard (Billy Bob Thornton) following the execution of her husband (played by rapper Sean Combs). Peter Boyle, Heath Ledger(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: A divorced boat builder discovers that his young son's stepdad is masking an evil side, forcing him to desperately try to protect his ex-wife and son from the new man in their lives(n)

programme.title: Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars in this epic western biopic chronicling the life of legendary lawman Wyatt Earp, from Dodge City to the shootout at the OK Corral(n)

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Eddie 'The Eagle' Edwards overcomes all odds and extraordinary challenges to become the first British man to compete in the Olympic ski jump event, making him the most famous ski jumper in the history of Great Britain(n)

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: A lovelorn composer flies to a Hawaiian resort in hopes of forgetting the woman who broke his heart, only to discover she and her new boyfriend have just checked in(n)

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: A high-level executive blows the whistle on his corrupt employers, but as he gathers inside information the FBI discover he might not be the most reliable source(n)

programme.title: Man on the Moon
programme.desc: Andy Kaufman's public image changed like the weather: he was loved and hated in equal measure and his innovative style of humour was often misunderstood. He acknowledged that he didn't know what was funny or not, and his material could generate laughs and tears, silence and brawls(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: This incisive biographical drama—written by brilliant wordsmith Aaron Sorkin—explores the genius and shortcomings of computing guru Steve Jobs in backstage vignettes spanning 14 years, as he and his closest advisers prepare for three different public presentations of era-defining technologies(n)

programme.title: The Hand that Rocks the Cradle
programme.desc: Peyton was once a happily married woman, but when her doctor husband is accused of assaulting a patient and he commits suicide, her world falls apart and she plots revenge. Claire, the woman who made the accusation, hires Peyton as a nanny, not knowing of their past involvement. Peyton then proceeds to terrorize the family, attempts to seduce the husband and generally destroy Claire as she feels she has been destroyed(n)

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: Former car thief Randall Memphis Raines (Nicolas Cage) must come out of retirement to steal 50 cars in one night or his brother Kip (Giovanni Ribisi) will die. Randall enlists help from a few boost happy pals to accomplish the seemingly impossible feat. From countless car chases to relentless cops, the roadblocks Randall must swerve around to save Kip add up to high-octane excitement(n)

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind retired army colonel hires a penniless student to look after him during a fateful weekend in New York City(n)

programme.title: Sea of Love
programme.desc: Jaded cop Frank trawls the lonely hearts column for clues to identify a serial killer preying on lovesick single men. Then he places his own advert, hoping to flush the killer out. Excellent crime thriller(n)

programme.title: Stealing Beauty
programme.desc: Nineteen-year-old American Lucy arrives in Tuscany to visit her dead mother's friends... and to lose her virginity(n)

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Biopic of Ernie Davis, who overcame prejudice to become the first black athlete to win the highest honour in college football(n)

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton has a blast as the foul-mouthed safecracker who dresses up as a department store Santa, then robs the joint(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: Return to the decade that taste forgot as Adam Sandler stars in this surprise smash comedy set amid the big hair, pastel shirts and relentlessly peppy pop of the 1980s. When one-time rock hopeful Robbie is jilted at the altar, he vents his bitterness in song, even when singing at other people's weddings! Only true love can redeem the broken hearted songster but fortunately, he's about to meet a woman who will spin him right round (like a record)(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage is the slick financier who usually wakes up to a blonde and the Wall St Journal. But not today, because angel Don Cheadle gives him a glimpse of what might have been, with kids, a wife and a job selling tires(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: A cocky marketing student works in a bar to get by, but falls under the tutelage of an older barman, who encourages him to live a selfish, hedonistic lifestyle(n)

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santa's black-sheep brother gets a much-needed shot at redemption in this holiday comedy reuniting actor Vince Vaughn and director David Dobkin (Clay Pigeons, Wedding Crashers). It's not easy being the brother of a benevolent and beloved saint, and no one knows that better than Fred Claus (Vaughn). After struggling for years to live up to the example set by his younger sibling Nicholas (Paul Giamatti), Fred has finally given up. These days Fred is working as a repo man taken to stealing the items he repossesses, and his shady tactics have just landed him in jail. While Mrs. Claus vehemently insists that Fred fend for himself, Nicholas refuses to sit idly by as his brother rots in jail and agrees to set bail if Fred will repay the debt by coming to the North Pole and help make toys for the upcoming Christmas season. But Fred isn't nearly as productive as your average elf, and he's got quite an attitude to boot. With Christmas fast approaching and Fred threatening to sideline Nicholas' entire finely tuned operation, the brother that always struggled to get out from under his sibling's substantial shadow finds out just how far the patience of a saint can be pushed before jolly old Santa reaches his breaking point(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: Mike Myers returns as master spy Austin Danger Powers (and, of course, his arch enemy Dr Evil) with a new sidekick in Felicity Shagwell (Heather Graham). Dr Evil has invented a time machine and gone back in time to steal Austin's sexual powers, leaving our hero in 1999 without the ability to perform. Not only does he have to rescue his libido but he must also thwart Dr Evil's plan to devastate Earth with a moon-based laser. With Robert Wagner, Michael York and Seth Green(n)

programme.desc: The squad investigates when a wealthy man is found murdered, and discover his family were all striving to get their hands on the inheritance. Sam Waterston stars.(n)

Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise and Eddie Cahill.(n)

Meanwhile, the team is called in to investigate the death of a sergeant from carbon monoxide poisoning - and finds a copy of Ducky's exhumation request on the man's laptop. Crime drama, starring David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy and Carmichael have the unenviable task of prosecuting three police officers with a racially motivated hate crime that threatens to cause uproar in the city. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Angie Harmon.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy tries to prosecute a pilot accused of murdering her married lover for trying to end their relationship, but finds himself battling the Navy and the office of the Judge Advocate General, who seem intent on obstructing his efforts. Acclaimed American detective drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team investigate the death of a hotel employee who plummeted from a balcony, and are alerted to another case by the sound of gunfire. Rushing to the scene, they find a woman who has shot dead a man for attacking her husband - an incident that brings back painful memories for Stella, who once killed a boyfriend in self-defence.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is called to the scene when there is an attempt on the life of FBI agent TC Fornell, with the assailant identified as Navy seaman Tyler Brown. The pair team up and visit the bar where Brown worked and bump into their mutual ex-wife Diane Sterling, who was operating undercover as an employee suspected of stealing customers' identities. Joe Spano and Melinda McGraw guest star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Returning from a six-month posting in the Gulf, Navy lieutenant commander Megan Huffner opens her front door to find her husband Noel dead in his chair. Gibbs and the team investigate and find the victim died three or four weeks earlier, and an unusual $100 bill in his wallet proves to be a vital clue. Meanwhile, Tony's father visits for Christmas and looks to rebuild their fractured relationship. Guest starring Robert Wagner.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A man arms himself and heads to a political rally where he embarks on a shooting spree, killing a state senator and several onlookers. The team members have to consider whether his actions were a conseqence of some mental defect or that he was fully aware of what he was doing. Crime drama, starring Corey Stoll, Rachel Ticotin and Alfred Molina.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A college student is murdered in an attack bearing all the hallmarks of a notorious serial killer. Stabler and the team believe it is the work of a copycat and their investigation leads them to a group of loyal followers, including a man who glorifies the crimes in his comic books.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team's investigation into the abduction of two girls leads to an artist from Louisiana who is in New York on business. The suspect is arrested, but launches a violent attack on Fin, and the revelation that he has schizophrenia forces Novak to confront her own past. Starring Diane Neal, Ice-T and Ayre Gross.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate when a model who gatecrashed the mayor's black-tie party is found dead in an alley. The victim's brother becomes a prime suspect before the detectives discover links between the girl and a New York senator who was also at the event.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team investigate the murder of an eminent archaeologist who has been shot dead in an alleyway. Tracing the evidence to a local tramp, they find him in possession of a stolen pocket watch linked to a missing persons case from the 1930s, and a pendant that provides a clue to a possible smuggling ring. Drama, starring Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac discovers the victims of three seemingly unrelated killings, which took place simultaneously at locations around the city, had one very significant thing in common - they were all about to go to trial for murder, and had agreed to provide evidence against a drug dealer in exchange for reduced sentences. Drama, starring Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes.(n)

He is confident he remains above suspicion, but Columbo realises something does not add up and sets out to wrest a confession from the musician. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Johnny Cash and Ida Lupino.(n)

programme.desc: The shooting of a petty officer looks like an open-and-shut case when a Russian man is found with a recently fired gun in his car. Military crime drama, with Mark Harmon, Cote de Pablo and David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a lance corporal, whose body has been found in an empty house, and discovers he had a number of spurned lovers and a $2million inheritance. Ducky and Gibbs interview one of the dead marine's partners, but disagree over whether she is telling the truth. David McCallum and Mark Harmon star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Kidnappers strike on Halloween, wounding a marine sergeant and snatching his daughter - leaving the team members wondering why anyone would try to extort money from someone on such a modest salary. As the agents begin searching for a motive, Abby surprises everyone by turning up at the lab in a revealing fancy-dress costume.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team joins forces with military investigators to ascertain whether terrorists were responsible for an explosion at a golf course in which a marine colonel was killed. As inquiries proceed, McGee has to use his computer skills to break into secret government files to ensure the murderers are apprehended. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A former marine falls to his death from a hotel balcony, and investigations quickly lead to the discovery of another body. As Gibbs and the team dig deeper, they uncover evidence that points to the activities of a vice ring trafficking young girls. Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen and Sam pose as traffic cops to infiltrate a gang of corrupt officers and military personnel who have been allowing smugglers and criminals a safe passage. Unfortunately, just as they are on the verge of solving the case, the group's leader is shot dead.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The Big Easy's annual Red Dress Run is brought to an abrupt halt when participants discover a body on route. Luckily, the NCIS team is competing in the race, and is on hand to investigate. The victim is identified as petty officer Kelsey Weaver, who was last seen running though the city, shouting that she was being pursued by a man with a gun. CCTV footage shows no signs of Weaver's apparent assailant, but when toxicology reports reveal the dead woman had traces of a hallucinogenic drug in her system, Pride and his colleagues are drawn into the battle to stop the spread of this new narcotic substance. Naval crime drama, starring Scott Bakula.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Two US Navy foremen are murdered at a Naval Branch health clinic, and with a little help from Brody's mother Olivia, the team discovers the two dead men had been tasked with delivering a heart for a transplant operation. The planned recipient was a skilled Dapra programmer with a rare blood type, but the killers made sure to ruin the procedure by putting a bullet through the organ before making their escape. However, when the heart in question turns out to be a decoy, the team begins to suspect the culprits may have stolen the real one for a criminal with a heart defect from the FBI's most wanted list. Naval crime drama, guest starring Annie Potts (Ghostbusters).(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. programme.desc: Unflinching tale of gangsters and lawyers, with Carlito Brigante trying to stay honest after a spell behind bars, and remain loyal to the lawyer who fought his corner (Sean Penn, in electric form)(n)

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A scientist survives a mankind-destroying virus and struggles to live in a New York City overflowing with cannibalistic zombies that come out only at night. Based on the 1954 sci-fi classic novel by Richard Matheson(n)

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: In this high-octane action sequel, hit man Arthur Bishop is forced to come out of retirement and commit three difficult assassinations in order to rescue his kidnapped lover. The hardest part: He must make all of the killings look like accidents(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Ben Affleck takes over the role of CIA überagent Jack Ryan in this adaptation of Tom Clancy's 1991 novel. But this time around, the author's familiar hero ("The Hunt for Red October") is an agency neophyte trying to stop a nuclear showdown between the U.S. and Russia(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: While treasure hunting in the Bahamas, a group of young divers discover a wrecked cargo plane on the ocean's floor. Within lies millions of dollars of illegal drugs, and the divers' dream of finding sunken treasure has come true. But as they argue among themselves about what to do with their prize, the friends soon realize they're not the only ones interested in the narcotics. Dangerous criminals are also searching for the drugs, and now the treasure hunters themselves have become the hunted(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Docudrama about the true story of the Deepwater Horizon disaster, which resulted in the largest offshore oil spill in US history. The film depicts the challenges the oil rig's crew faced as they fought for survival(n)

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: NYC cop John McClane fights terrorists in an L.A. high-rise in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages. Meanwhile, the terrorists attempt to steal $600 million from a high-tech safe(n)

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary(n)

programme.title: The Arrival
programme.desc: They have been saying for years that the Greenhouse Effect is going to destroy the planet. For years humans have blamed themselves for spewing climate-changing gasses into our fragile atmosphere. But are we as guilty as we think we are or are there more sinister forces at work? Paying tribute to an old-fashioned '50s style paranoid (the aliens have come to take over the planet) sci-fi low-budget thriller, this film gives a chilling answer to that question. It begins with the scene of a young woman picking poppies in a verdant field. She is obviously puzzled and as the camera pulls away it becomes clear why. The story then jumps to a California observatory where nerdish radio telescope operator Zane Ziminski is suddenly jarred from the boredom of monitoring random space noises by a strangely regular series of unearthly blips that he is convinced come from an alien galaxy and for some reason are being deliberately beamed to Earth. Excitedly he takes the recorded evidence to his boss, who promptly fires him. Convinced that the aliens were transmitting messages to aliens already on our planet, Ziminski quickly builds a make-shift radio telescope and high tech computer system in his garage so he can pinpoit the destination of the singles. This leads him to an isolated Mexican village where he and another scientist (the lady from the poppy field), who has drawn similar conclusions, team up and go alien-hunting. They don't hunt long, for the villagers turn out to be mighty strange people. From there it is only a short time before they find the underground alien lair where they learn that the invaders' home planet is dying and that they are planning to "terraform" the Earth in preparation of colonizing it. Part of the process involves deliberately accelerating the Greenhouse effect. The special effects are well-done and refreshingly, they are not overpowering(n)

programme.title: Trespass
programme.desc: Two Arkansas firemen learn from a dying man that he hid a stash of gold in a disused warehouse 50 years earlier in an East St Louis ghetto. When they go in search of the loot, the pair unwittingly observe a murder carried out by the local mob and become targets themselves, especially when it becomes known why they happen to be in the area in the first place(n)

programme.title: Halloween: Resurrection
programme.desc: In the chilling eighth installment of the series, a group of frightened teens tries to live through the night in killer Michael Myers' childhood home as part of an Internet contest set up by an entrepreneur (Busta Rhymes). Little do they know that someone is in the house waiting for them. Jamie Lee Curtis, Ryan Merriman, Bianca Kajlich, Thomas Ian Nicholas(n)

programme.title: Chernobyl Diaries
programme.desc: An extreme vacation turns absolutely terrifying when a group of friends visit the Chernobyl disaster site 25 years later. Tourists and their guide become unexpectedly stranded in the town of Pripyat, located near the old facility, and realize they are being hunted. Now, the harder they try to flee, the faster their numbers dwindle until only a few are left standing to battle unspeakable evil(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: This rip-roaring remake of the 1965 adventure classic soars thanks to stunning aerial photography and fantastic special effects. Dennis Quaid plays a pilot whose plane crashes in the Gobi Desert, where he and his crew try to reconstruct their craft and fly it to safety. The film marks the directorial debut of John Moore. Tyrese Gibson, Miranda Otto, Giovanni Ribisi, Tony Curran, Kirk Jones (a.k.a. Sticky Fingaz), Hugh Laurie, Scott Michael Campbell, Jared Padalecki, Kevork Malikyan(n)

programme.title: Pride and Glory

programme.title: World War II in Color
programme.desc: The Gathering Storm. Documentary telling the full story of World War II with the aid of rare and unseen archive footage, recently released official documents, modern colourisation techniques, state-of-the-art satellite-delivered terrain mapping and graphics. In the run-up to September 1939, political and economic chaos in the aftermath of World War I allowed Hitler in Germany, Mussolini in Italy and ultra-nationalists in imperial Japan to seize absolute power. When Britain, France and the United States failed to confront initial acts of aggression, contempt for their weakness prompted Germany and Italy to intervene in the civil war in Spain and Hitler to make a series of land grabs which brought Europe to the brink of war. Ep. 1 (Followed by News)(n)

programme.title: World War II in Color
programme.desc: Lightning War. Documentary telling the full story of World War II with the aid of rare and unseen archive footage, recently released official documents and modern techniques of colouring and satellite mapping. Germany took just four weeks to conquer Poland, using a new form of warfare - Blitzkrieg. Six armoured tank units known as Panzer divisions, supported by the Luftwaffe, quickly broke through Polish defences and were so successful that Hitler also used them against the Allies. Despite superior men and equipment, France and England had not learned the lessons of the Polish defeat and were utterly at a loss how to counter such attacks. (Followed by News)(n)

programme.title: World War II in Color
programme.desc: Britain at Bay. After the retreat from Dunkirk, Churchill rallied Britain in its darkest hour. Hitler was only just across the channel, but he reckoned without our supreme strategist, the might of the navy and the manoeuvrability of the air force. Crucially, Britain now had radar and the Enigma code had been broken. After the Battle of Britain, Churchill commenced the fight back(n)

programme.title: World War II in Color
programme.desc: Hitler Strikes East. The fourth episode explores Hitler's assault on the Soviet Union in the summer of 1941, Operation Barbarossa and his attack on the Caucasus in 1942. (Followed by News)(n)

programme.title: World War II in Color

programme.title: World War II in Color

programme.desc: Return to the Ranch. A new parolee, Joe, joins Tia to rescue puppies in a trucking yard; Tia must decide if she will allow former parolee, Jake, back on the ranch(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Long Road Home. A Hurricane Katrina survivor finally has a shot at a forever home; Louise and Matt try to find a pit bull that's loose on the streets(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Why We Go On. Tia clashes with a shelter over a dog's fate after she risked her life to rescue it. Meanwhile, a dog that was near death has recovered and may find a forever home in Boston(n)
