Determined to prove that she's not overreacting, Riley puts Danny on `trial' for breaking her heart, with Bonnie acting as Danny's lawyer. Meanwhile, Ben tries to save face with Zoey after discovering that her ex-boyfriend has returned and wants to get back together with her.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Ben discovers that Tucker has found an unusual way to make some extra cash but when he decides to do the same he rapidly lives to regret it. Riley and Danny continue to argue while attempting to host an engagement party for a friend and it soon becomes clear that their mothers, arch enemies Bonnie and Jennifer, must team up to get the warring couple back together.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Rainbow reconnects with her college friends on social media and invites them over for an elaborate dinner party to impress them. On the night, Dre learns some new facts about his wife's past, and the kids decide to create their own reality show by documenting the party.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Dre finds himself questioning his own 'blackness' when a white executive at the advertising agency challenges him over his street cred and picks inept Charlie to run a big urban market account. Pops gets a letter from the tax office and fears the worst.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Murray intervenes when Adam asks Beverly to help him avoid the humiliation of taking a national physical fitness test at school. Meanwhile, Erica decides to have some fun at Barry's expense when he tries to woo her French pen pal.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry hosts a `no parents allowed' birthday party for Adam, instead of the laser tag party that was originally planned. He hopes to help his little brother get his first kiss with Dana, but his action sparks some surprisingly protective instincts in Erica. Comedy, starring Troy Gentile and Sean Giambrone.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Leonard and Sheldon are invited to speak at UC Berkeley, they decide to take a detour and try to meet one of their idols - Star Wars director George Lucas. Meanwhile, Raj and Amy offer to settle a dispute with a game of table tennis. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard finds out that he has a half-brother, Sheldon and Amy have a platonic sleepover, and Penny gets an offer to audition for a Kevin Smith film. American comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Yasmine goes a step too far with Lily, while Harry turns to alcohol to heal his pain. Elsewhere, Misbah catches Kim and Farrah kissing and pleads with Kim to break up with her daughter, and Scott gets himself a job working with his secret brother, Damon.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The end of week one of the travelling popularity contest sees the group members take part in a pesto-making class in Genoa and make a visit to a donkey sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny makes an important decision after Leonard tries to help her in the aftermath of a failed role on a TV show. Meanwhile, Raj and Stuart practise talking to strangers at a shopping centre, and Sheldon studies to become a comic genius. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to relax after he is forced to take a holiday, and when Penny quits her job the duo end up spending time together. Meanwhile, Leonard struggles to be supportive of his girlfriend's career decision, Bernadette seeks Stuart's help in replacing one of Howard's comic books, and Howard and Raj provide Amy with some advice. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A writer moves into a house where several people died years previously, but keeps the building's dark history a secret from his family. While researching a book on the incident, he discovers a series of old cine films of the deaths, but as he watches them, he uncovers a supernatural force behind the tragedy. Horror, starring Ethan Hawke and Juliet Rylance.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy finds she has romantic feelings for Penny's former boyfriend Zack, while Raj and Howard begin competing to prove which of them would make the better superhero. Comedy, guest starring Brian Thomas Smith.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard face problems when they file for a patent for their infinite persistence gyroscope. Plus, Penny, Amy and Bernadette give Raj dating advice when Emily reaches out to him after their breakup. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The nation's favourite armchair critics share their opinions on what they watch in December, 2016, including Strictly Come Dancing, Planet Earth II, First Dates, Rillington Place, David Blaine: Beyond Magic, The Big Life Fix with Simon Reeve, When Phillip Met Prince Philip and White Christmas.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers on Holiday
programme.desc: New series. Alice, Jay, Sketch and new boy Glen right the wrongful inkings of Brits in the Mediterranean. In the opener, Sketch helps Bobby erase his uncouth cartoon character.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Alex Zane counts down the top 50 funniest family-based internet videos, including the best way to wake a teenager, the most cringeworthy wedding dance, and a father in a nappy-changing smackdown.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Ladies' man Luke, 30, is ready to give up playing the field and is searching for the one. His date is 29-year-old PR manager Sophie. Tired of turning up to weddings alone, she's looking for a man to become her 'plus-one' in life. The restaurant also welcomes Bristolian mother of three Mandy, whose date is 52-year-old landscape gardener Andrew.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Outrageous video footage of stunts and pranks, including the best wedding dancers, a shark surfer, a wheelchair backflipper, and an interview with the man responsible for a memorable BMX crash. Presented by Matt Kirshen.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Robin goes for brunch with Ted's parents, but worries they will not like her. However, once the meal has got under way, she discovers they have been hiding a huge secret from him. Meanwhile, Lily and Marshall try to adjust to their new relationship.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney gives Ted advice after he has his first big fight with Robin, while Lily persuades them to make up. However, later that night the friends go to a party for lawyers - and Lily and Robin are told Ted has left with another woman. Neil Patrick Harris and Josh Radnor star.(n)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Featuring a forecourt prank, juggling hats, a nodding dog and some stunt driving.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The family rally round when Erica is dumped by her boyfriend, and Beverly goes in search of a handsome replacement. Barry needs money when he becomes addicted to an arcade game.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Murray coaches Barry for his first high school wrestling match but keeps it a secret from Beverly, who is sure to disapprove of her son taking part in such a dangerous sport. Adam blackmails Erica into waiting in line with him to buy tickets for the new Stars Wars movie.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from south Wales compete, beginning with Esther and Darryl, who fight for control in the kitchen. Next up are Louise and David, who aim to impress with their Welsh-themed evening, and give a revealing insight into their private lives. The contestants expect an extravagant party on the final night, which is hosted by Carl and Brian, before the winners of the £1,000 prize are announced.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three Birmingham couples compete to host the best dinner party and win a cash prize. Amanda and her husband Anthony kick off the competition with an ambitious menu, before it's the turn of festival lover Oli and his girlfriend LC, who prepare a vegetarian menu for their guests. However, their evening is tainted by Anthony, who upsets several of the guests with an untoward remark. Civil partners Steve and Sean try to put the week's tension behind them as they focus on winning the cash prize.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: New series. Tour leader Brendan Sheerin returns as 14 young Brits head off on an epic 40-day road trip around the Mediterranean and southern Europe, starting in Cannes.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: On the second day of the road trip, the group experiences the glamour of Monaco, as well as some rock climbing and an awe-inspiring helicopter tour.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: On the third day of the road trip the group arrives in San Remo, Italy, where Brendan pushes the boat out with a luxury snorkelling trip, followed by a life drawing class.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: Flirting and competitiveness both head through the roof as the travellers build a prehistoric home, before Brendan takes them on a treasure hunt with a difference.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The end of week one of the travelling popularity contest sees the group members take part in a pesto-making class in Genoa and make a visit to a donkey sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Astro Boy
programme.desc: An inventor living in a futuristic city creates a robot in the image of his dead son, but later rejects him. As the mechanical child tries to find his place in the world, he attracts the attention of the power-mad president, who wants to use him as a weapon. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Freddie Highmore and Nicolas Cage.(n)

programme.title: Toy Story OF TERROR
programme.desc: Animated Halloween special, in which the Toy Story characters spend a spooky night at a roadside motel. When one of the playthings goes missing, the others set out to find them before they suffer a similar fate. With the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: First episode of the comedy, focusing on an 11-year-old boy as he captures his family on video camera during the 1980s. Barry wants to start driving on his 16th birthday, but Beverly advises against it and refuses to allow Pops to sell him his old car. Starring Jeff Garlin, Troy Gentile and Wendi McLendon-Covey.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: A day at the roller-skating rink leaves Murray wishing he had not asked Erica to tell him about her life, while Pops steps in to help when a back-to-school shopping trip causes problems between Beverly and Adam. Comedy, starring Jeff Garlin, Wendi McLendon-Covey and Hayley Orrantia.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry needs the money to buy an expensive new pair of basketball trainers, so Murray hires him to work at his furniture shop. Beverly refuses to let Adam see a new horror film, but he goes behind her back and tricks Pops into taking him to the cinema. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica and Barry wonder how they will appear in the school yearbook. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica cannot wait to get out of the house as Graduation Day approaches - until it dawns on her how much her mother's affection means to her. Barry's plans for a summer with Lainey turn to dust, while Dana makes an unexpected visit. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Hayley Orrantia.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny is stunned when Sheldon announces he is about to go on his first-ever date, and is even more surprised to find herself tagging along. Meanwhile, Leonard and Raj take a trip to the hospital after Howard's new robotic arm creates problems.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to extend his lifespan, concerned he will not be around long enough for his consciousness to be downloaded into a robot body, and the friends encounter Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak (guest starring as himself) at the Cheesecake Factory.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: An embarrassing secret from Howard's past comes to light as he tries to win back Bernadette, while Sheldon and Raj engage in a battle of wills when they have to work in the same office. Guest starring Katee Sackhoff and George Takei.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is depressed that everyone seems to be paired off except him, and resorts to desperate measures to get a girlfriend. Meanwhile, Sheldon looks for a way out of his relationship with Amy, who wants him to meet her mother. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: As Howard and his fellow astronauts sit in the space shuttle awaiting launch, he reflects on the tumultuous events of the previous few days, when he and Bernadette tried to get married. Meanwhile, his friends witness the blast-off on TV at home.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny and Leonard try to distract Sheldon from his career woes by reinstating Anything Can Happen Thursday, but it causes friction among the gang when Amy and Bernadette are caught lying. Meanwhile, Raj seeks Howard's help in preparing for a date with Emily. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang's preparations for Star Wars Day are interrupted by the news that Professor Proton has died. Leonard and Penny attend the funeral, where they talk about their rejected marriage proposals, but Sheldon has difficulty dealing with the death of his childhood hero - until a surprise visitor helps him cope with his grief. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco, with a guest appearance by Bob Newhart.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny struggles with Leonard's confession that he kissed another woman when he was away on his North Sea research expedition. After driving all the way to Las Vegas, she must now decide whether she wants to go through with the wedding. Back home, Sheldon doesn't know how to act after Amy tells him she wants them to take a relationship break.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard meets up with the woman he kissed during his trip in the hope of setting Penny's mind at ease, while Sheldon films a special episode of Fun with Flags after his break-up with Amy. Bernadette feels guilty about keeping a secret from Penny.(n)

programme.title: This Is 40
programme.desc: A couple wrestle with a series of crises as their 40th birthdays loom on the horizon, turning to friends and family for help in coping with the challenges of work, parenthood, age and debt. Comedy, starring Paul Rudd and Leslie Mann reprising their roles from Knocked Up. With Megan Fox, Albert Brooks and John Lithgow.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The first-ever edition of the review programme in which some of Britain's most opinionated and avid viewers comment on the best and worst shows of the previous seven days, from the comfort of their sofas. The first edition includes discussions on One Born Every Minute, 16 Kids and Counting, Top Gear, Bank of Dave, Dancing on Ice, Embarrassing Bodies and Meteor Strike: Fireball from Space. Narrated by Caroline Aherne. First aired in March 2013.(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Trojan War. This sports documentary probes the University of Southern California's return to the elite of college football under head coach Pete Carroll and the program's precipitous fall from grace when the NCAA hit the school with sanctions. Originally aired on ESPN as part of the network's acclaimed "30 for 30" series, this feature-length doc uses interviews with Carroll, Matt Leinart, LenDale White, and many more to encapsulate the rise and fall of the Trojans during Carroll's nine-year reign at USC. Directed by Aaron Rahsaan Thomas, who studied film at USC in the midst of Carroll's tenure as head coach(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: A look at how the 20,000 islands in the region became colonised by humans and animals. For the Polynesians, the Pacific's first people, their journeys constituted a feat of navigational ingenuity, while animals often had to rely on violent forces of nature, such as cyclones and tsunamis, to reach the shores.(n)

programme.title: Dino Gangs
programme.desc: Part two of two. Phil Currie explores the hunting behaviour of the Tyrannosaurus rex, arguing the creatures worked in packs and tore their prey to shreds in frenzied attacks. Dr Currie journeys to some of the most remote and inhospitable places on the planet in search of evidence that may reveal how just how brutally the tyrant lizard king lorded over their domain, and why their reign of terror lasted so long.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor heads to Cuba, where he begins by fishing with locals on an esplanade in Havana. He then visits one of the country's biggest rivers, the Rio Hatiguanico, to hunt for tarpon, before travelling to the remote island of Cayo Romano in search of bonefish. Having landed some impressive game fish, Robson sails to a reef near Trinidad marina in the hope of catching something for his dinner.(n)

programme.title: Life in the Undergrowth
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores how insects compensate for their small size by banding together in vast numbers. He reveals that the operations of many of these societies are so finely tuned they appear to work as a single entity. Footage shows how African termite mounds act as huge ventilation systems of such sophistication that humans are only now beginning to unravel the mechanics of the structure.(n)

programme.title: South Pacific

For the Polynesians, the Pacific's first people, their journeys constituted a feat of navigational ingenuity, while animals often had to rely on violent forces of nature, such as cyclones and tsunamis, to reach the shores.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: An exploration of the world's most densely inhabited waters, where variations in temperature owing to the year-long cycle of the sun encourage a vast array of marine life, from seals and sharks in the winter, to lobster and salmon in the summer, dolphins in the autumn and the walking handfish in spring. Narrated by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: A look at the lives of the world's smallest predators.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Miracle Orphans
programme.desc: Presenters Ellie Harrison and Max Hug Williams follow orphaned baby animals as they make steps to return to the wild. Ellie travels to Australia to meet three koalas called Tilly, Puddles and Danny, who were rescued from the roadside where their mother had been killed - Danny needs around-the-clock care and is building up his strength with night-time games of chase. She also meets a tiny wallaby called Neil, whose carer Stella is worried may die from stress if they can't find him a companion. Elsewhere, wildlife cameraman Max is in Costa Rica where he gets acquainted with Newbie, a five-month-old three-toed sloth who has suffered from pneumonia since she was rescued. He follows wildlife manager Sam at Kids Saving the Rainforest as she tries to teach the baby sloth to climb trees and learn to go back to the wild.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Miracle Orphans
programme.desc: In Australia, Ellie Harrison meets Sue, who has been caring for bare-nosed wombat Stacey since her mother was killed four months previously. To get the animal used to the outside world, they take her into they garden for the first time. However, interaction with other wombats is a vital part of rehabilitation, so they need to find a suitable companion before she can be released. Wildlife cameraman Max Hug Williams is in Costa Rica, finding out how three-toed sloth Newbie is responding to treatment and meeting a 10-month-old anteater as he learns to forage the critters he needs to keep him going.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Miracle Orphans
programme.desc: Presenters Ellie Harrison and Max Hug Williams follow orphaned baby animals as they make steps to return to the wild.(n)

programme.title: The Snow Wolf Family and Me
programme.desc: Part one of two. Wildlife cameraman Gordon Buchanan hopes to get closer to wild wolves than anyone before to discover the true nature of this feared predator and heads to the north of Canada in search of a pack that has never seen people and so has no fear of humans. He begins to gain the trust of an Arctic wolf family and as time passes becomes accepted by the pack, including a female and its three newborn pups, and has some close encounters that reveal a softer side to the animals.(n)

programme.title: The Snow Wolf Family and Me
programme.desc: Part two of two. Gordon Buchanan returns to Canada in the autumn to reunite with the Arctic wolves he has been following as they try to raise their pups and prepare for winter. The cameraman also walks with members of the pack as they hunt lemmings, musk oxen and hares and encounter a rival pack.(n)

programme.title: Seed of Chucky
programme.desc: Maniacal doll Chucky and his bride go on a killing spree in Hollywood after being resurrected by their gentle offspring(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: More than a decade since a painful Prom Night accident scuppered his chances with the hottest girl in school, a perennial loser decides to track her down and win her over. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Computer-generated action comes fast and furious in this special-effects driven fantasy adventure. The adventure begins in 1969 when little Alan Parish, lonely, picked on, and largely ignored by his wealthy father, a shoe manufacturer in a picturesque New England town, explores a construction site and unearths a mysterious, ornate box with the name Jumanji upon it. He takes it home to his big empty mansion and sees that it is some sort of game. His father returns home and informs the poor boy, who had been beaten up earlier in the day, that he has been enrolled in a prestigious boarding school. A fight ensues just before his parents go out for the evening. Alone and frustrated, Alan and his friend Sarah, open the box and begin playing the strange game. As soon as they choose their pieces and set them upon the board, the pieces become stuck. Sarah rolls the dice and her piece moves by itself. As it moves the great crystal in the center of the game board begins to swirl and a cryptic message appears. Suddenly the room is filled with giant African bats. Alan rolls next and finds himself encircled in a swirling vortex of smoke and he is then literally sucked into the game. Nothing the terrified Sarah does can get him back, so she flees. Over twenty years pass and a young woman and two children, her orphaned niece and nephew, are seen moving into the now-ramshackle Parrish manse. There the children hear a great drumming sound in the attic. Curious, they creep in and find Jumanji. They begin to play the game and suddenly find themselves beset by deadly blood-sucking mosquitoes, maliciously mischievous monkeys, man-eating plants, and a lion. Then long-lost, but now full-grown, Alan suddenly appears pursued by an ruthless 18th-century hunter. Banished by the game to live alone in the jungle all these years, Alan has become a crazed wild man. It is he who explains the sinister game that must be completed for the horror to end. After recruiting a reluctant and frightened grown-up Sarah, the hapless players unleash upon themselves and their town, untold horrors, including a stampeding heard of African animals, crocodiles, and a flood(n)

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: A desperate movie producer will stop at nothing to make his movie with the biggest actor in Hollywood, so he finds a nerdy look-alike to be his star(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Anarchic, nihilistic satire on modern life in which an office worker who feels emotionally deadened by his consumerist lifestyle has a chance encounter with a charismatic man. Finding that they are kindred spirits, the two men start up a no-holds-barred bare-knuckle fighting club, with the aim of making its members feel 'alive' once again. Based on Chuck Palahniuk's novel(n)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: Ultra-violent futuristic thriller about infantry trainees preparing to wipe out mankind's newest enemy: giant bugs from outer space(n)

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
programme.desc: A withdrawn young man in a small rural town grows bored with his life, which consists of a meaningless job and the tiresome task of caring for his mentally handicapped brother. The arrival of a new girl in town, however, brings unexpected changes for everyone in this quirky drama(n)

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: Herbert Ross' musical romance stars Kevin Bacon as Ren McCormack, a teenager who moves from Chicago to a small town where, to his horror, he discovers rock music and dancing are outlawed at the behest of preacher Shaw Moore, who blames the death of his daughter on the devil's music. And to complicate matters, Ren falls for Moore's surviving daughter Ariel who is not as innocent as she seems. As Ren tries to persuade Moore that rock music isn't the root of all evil, a confrontation with both his daughter and the more bigoted members of his congregation give him food for thought in this classic feel-good film. Premiere(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain(n)

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: The sons of Sheriff Brody are working at a marine theme park in Florida, but are in piscatorial purgatory once more when a rogue Great White shark starts attacking the tourists. Action adventure originally released in 3D(n)

programme.title: Jaws: The Revenge
programme.desc: The man-eating shark wants revenge on Brody's widow, pursuing her and her marine biologist son to the Bahamas(n)

programme.desc: A year after their car hit a stranger, four teenagers are being stalked by someone(n)

programme.title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: A year after the original tragedy, Julie James is in college trying to piece her life back together. When her roommate, Karla, wins a trip for four to a tropical island, everything seems to be fine. That changes during a seemingly harmless karaoke session, however, when instead of lyrics a menacing message appears on the teleprompter to return the horror to Julie's life..(n)

Harry Connick Jr., Gena Rowlands, Mae Whitman, Kathy Najimy. Directed by Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: Herbert Ross' musical romance stars Kevin Bacon as Ren McCormack, a teenager who moves from Chicago to a small town where, to his horror, he discovers rock music and dancing are outlawed at the behest of preacher Shaw Moore, who blames the death of his daughter on the devil's music. And to complicate matters, Ren falls for Moore's surviving daughter Ariel who is not as innocent as she seems. As Ren tries to persuade Moore that rock music isn't the root of all evil, a confrontation with both his daughter and the more bigoted members of his congregation give him food for thought in this classic feel-good film. Premiere(n)

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Donnie Brasco, a Mafia mobster who's thick as thieves with Lefty Ruggerio (Al Pacino), a leading man in the Organisation. But Donnie is also Joe Pistone, an Fbi agent sent to infiltrate who instead becomes seduced by the camaraderie on offer. Mike Newell's film, based on a true story (Pistone is still part of the witness protection programme), is more concerned about friendship, loyalty and the agony of duplicity than the reality of mob violence(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's terrifying masterpiece about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. But when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant Great White, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again. Based on Peter Benchley's best-seller, three sequels and numerous imitators followed. Steven Spielberg(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Four years later, Brody now finds himself in a race against time when a new killer shark attacks ten boats manned by teenagers, which include his own sons(n)

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: The sons of Sheriff Brody are working at a marine theme park in Florida, but are in piscatorial purgatory once more when a rogue Great White shark starts attacking the tourists. Action adventure originally released in 3D(n)

programme.title: Jaws: The Revenge
programme.desc: The man-eating shark wants revenge on Brody's widow, pursuing her and her marine biologist son to the Bahamas(n)

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: A young surfer is hunted by a great white shark at a secluded beach, and ends up stranded on an embankment away from the shoreline. Alone and wounded, she attempts to survive the attack and get ashore in this bone-chilling thriller(n)

programme.title: Jaws

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: All-action adventure spiced with humour in which a retired Special Forces colonel returns to action when a ruthless South American dictator kidnaps his 11-year-old daughter. Armed to the teeth, he sets out to bring her back, leaving a trail of destruction(n)

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Gerard Butler stars in Marc Forster's violent, fact-based drama about a substance-addicted criminal who finds God and relocates to Sudan to offer his own idiosyncratic brand of Christian charity. The film initially portrays Sam Childers as being a far from nice man: a misogynistic biker whose life is steeped in crime, narcotics and violence, and who quickly returns to armed robbery almost as soon as he's released from jail. But while he was inside, his wife Lynn found Jesus, and, after Sam gets stabbed, she urges him to join her at church. Sam subsequently has his own Damascene moment and starts life afresh, founding his own (legitimate) construction company. Before long he has also built his own church. But it's only after a trip to Sudan, where he witnesses the devastation wrought by the marauding Lord's Resistance Army, that he truly becomes driven. Relocating to the African country, he sets up a faith-based centre to care for victims of the LRA's violence and rape. And also takes up arms to literally fight the good fight... Also starring Michael Shannon(n)

programme.title: State Property
programme.desc: A killer hip-hop soundtrack backbeats this intense urban drama about gangsters who muscle in on the drug trade in their Philly neighborhood. Things get complicated when they buck up against local crime lords(n)

programme.title: Lord of Illusions
programme.desc: Horror tale about a detective trying to get to the bottom of a mystery. New York private eye Harry D0092Amour takes on a routine case which turns ominous when he stumbles upon a mystery involving the world famous illusionist, Philip Swann and his beautiful wife, Dorothea. When a tragedy occurs at one of Swann0092s magic shows, Harry is drawn towards a whirlpool of deceit and unimaginable terrors. As he begins to fall in love with Dorothea, he comes face-to-face with Nix, the diabolic power which gave Swann his dark magic(n)

programme.desc: The Beast from the Belly of a Boeing. Hannibal's plan to free a skyjacked 747 requires adjustment, when B.A. becomes cataleptic and Murdock is temporarily blinded(n)

programme.desc: Noble Jinyiwei Qinglong must fight his former allies after an evil eunuch overthrows the Emperor. Now, in order to restore the rightful Emperor to his throne, Qinglong must use his blades to defeat the very assassins he once fought alongside(n)

programme.title: Mobsters
programme.desc: High testosterone-count gangster thriller, set in the organized crime-ridden America of the 1920s. Four young men, Charlie 'Lucky' Luciano, Meyer Lansky, Benny 'Bugsy' Siegel and Frank Costello, form a bond of loyalty and friendship which sees them rise to the pinnacle of the criminal underworld. Gradually though, they find themselves caught between two much more powerful mob bosses: Don Masseria and Arnold Rothstein, who make their lives far more dangerous. A well-plotted, energetically stylish first feature from former advert director Michael Karbelnikoff(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Secret Santa.
programme.desc: With Natalie tagging along in the guise of an elf, Adrian goes to work as a department store Santa in a bid to catch a fugitive suspected of poisoning a police officer. Unfortunately, seasonal jollity is not his forte. Detective drama, starring Tony Shalhoub.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and Jane investigate when the body of a missing research student is discovered in a tank of flesh-eating insects at a natural history museum. The pair believe the woman was murdered by one of her fellow academics following her pioneering discovery of a new moth species - an accolade they suspect the culprit wanted to claim as their own. Drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon, Jane and the team investigate when a rich, elderly woman's charred remains are found on the floor of a room in her mansion. They find the list of suspects is quite lengthy, including a nephew who was suing her in order to take control of the family fortune, a doctor who was overprescribing her pain medication and an alcoholic acquaintance at a war veteran's home. Jane, though, has a feeling that something about this case hasn't been right from the start.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lorelei Martins returns to avenge the death of her sister, convinced she has identified at least one of those responsible. She lies in wait at the home of a staff member of a shelter for battered women, eventually handcuffing her victim to a table and dispensing some savage justice. Thanks to the presence of a security camera, the team is soon after her, while Jane tries to exploit the situation to catch a bigger fish - Red John.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and Jane investigate the murder of Corporal Lucy Green, who was a medic in an army hospital and spent a lot of time helping veterans who had post-traumatic stress disorder. Jane figures out a patient named Jacob made the emergency call, but he is suffering from severe amnesia and does not remember anything about that evening. Starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Part one of two. Brenda tries to track down a witness in Atlanta, and takes the opportunity to visit home. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Part two of two. Brenda is forced to be creative when her witness remains hesitant, while the stress starts to get to Fritz. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The team is called in to assist with crowd control when a fire spreads through Griffith Park, but an investigation into the murder of a woman whose body is discovered in the chaos soon takes priority. Meanwhile, temporarily sharing an apartment with Fritz causes problems for Brenda. Detective drama series, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: When a murderer recently released from prison is killed in a hit-and-run, the team tries to determine whether the incident was intentional or a coincidence. Meanwhile, Brenda struggles in her personal life as she deals with an incapacitated Fritz. Guest starring Paul Michael Glaser.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is murdered at the home of Gunnery Sergeant Holt Perkins, and while the victim is initially assumed to be the marine's wife, analysis reveals her to be a convicted thief, presumed to be on the scene as part of a plot to hit Perkins' house. When the agents discover the calling card of notorious terror cell Dragon's Tooth on the body, it becomes clear the murder has been committed as part of a wider agenda, and the team joins forces with the Department of Defence to catch the killer. American drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A prostitute and what seems to be one of her clients are gunned down in a drive-by shooting, and when it emerges that the would-be John was actually a Navy officer, Gibbs and DiNozzo realise the killings are connected Lex Tarlionas, an incomplete operation to bring justice to those responsible for an attack on a US airport in 1979, which left 100 people dead. The main suspect is a former Colombian drugs kingpin known as Tomas Orlando, and the murdered sex worker was about to hand over crucial DNA evidence that could have connected him to the crime, but now that she is dead, Gibbs and the others must find another way to finally bring Orlando in. American drama, starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo teams up with his girlfriend, ATF agent Zoe Keates, to investigate the circumstances surrounding the death of a US Marine in what initially seems like a simple road accident. The team reveals the dead man did indeed die due to a broken neck sustained during a crash, but someone shot at him first. As DiNozzo and Keates pursue their inquiry, they discover the victim's death is connected to a controversial ATF plan to place traceable firearms in the criminal system, and then follow them to the heads of crime organisations. Naval crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine visits the home of his former captain, only to find the man has been killed, and the killer is waiting inside the property. While the soldier escapes with his life, the attacker gets away too. It quickly emerges the prime suspect is Qasim, an Afghan translator evidence, and evidence points against him, until it is discovered he has a brother, who is loyal to the Taliban. The subsequent chain of evidence leads Gibbs and Bishop to Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer is kidnapped, but manages to escape her captor, and the team discovers her abduction may be connected to her missing husband. Meanwhile, Abby knits everyone `gifts'.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: The team has difficulty portraying a surgeon with a God complex as a sympathetic figure for the jury, so Bull hires Liberty Davis - a previous client's attorney - to help.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian turns to substance abuse to calm his nerves when a storm hits Quahog, but finds it difficult to sober up. Meanwhile, Meg plucks up the courage to take action after one too many insults from her family.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Screams of Silence: The Story of Brenda Q.
programme.desc: Quagmire is admitted to hospital following an accident, so his sister Brenda travels to Quahog to care for him with her boyfriend in tow - but he soon discovers she is the one who needs help.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine is swept off her feet by a romantic cyborg version of her husband who has come back from the future, and the encounter forces her to question her relationship with the real Stan. Meanwhile, Roger directs Steve and his friends in a remake of cult classic adventure movie The Goonies.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is initially impressed to discover Roger played in the 1980 US Olympic hockey team - but later finds that he took steroids to help improve his performance, and makes him give the medal back.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: 8 Simple Rules for Buying My Teenage Daughter.
programme.desc: Peter runs up a massive bill at the pharmacy and decides to sell Meg to the Goldmans to help pay it off - much to their son Neil's delight. However, she becomes jealous when he starts dating someone else. Meanwhile, Stewie falls in love with his new babysitter.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Breaking Out Is Hard to Do.
programme.desc: Lois is sent to prison for persistent shoplifting, plunging the family into such disarray that Peter feels obliged to help her escape. Forced to go on the run, they take refuge in `Asian Town' - where Joe eventually tracks them down.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan tries to show Hayley that he can still provide relevant advice by resolving to improve the life of a stripper. However, his hopes of proving his headstrong daughter wrong are dashed when his circumstances change for the worse, and he ends up dancing for cash at his own strip club.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: The world ends on Christmas Day, and the entire population of Earth is taken to Heaven - except for Stan and Francine, who get left behind and find themselves involved in an all-out war against the Antichrist.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: American social worker Sarah Goode is taken hostage by militants in northern Syria, and thanks to the efforts of the Navy Seals, is eventually returned home unharmed. Evidence from the incident suggests US citizen Kyle Nasry was connected to the kidnapping, but when the agents trace Nasry to a rally held by a controversial imam, they are surprised to find Sarah among the attendees. Meanwhile, DiNozzo finally takes his relationship with Zoe Keates public - surprising none of his colleagues. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and his colleagues investigate when Eric Kutzler, the first openly gay Navy lieutenant tipped to receive the Medal of Honour, is murdered. While the agents initially suspect Kutzler's death was the result of a hate crime, the fact that his police officer husband waited 20 minutes to report the crime suggests he had something to hide. Meanwhile, the team throws a baby shower for Palmer as his wife's due date approaches. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo investigates a murder at the military academy he once attended, after a murdered marine and alumni of the school is found clutching a photo of a current student. Meanwhile, Bishop and her husband invite the team out for a special dinner. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team suspects Gibbs's arch-nemesis is behind an explosion at a summit on global terror. Meanwhile, a grief-stricken Fornell struggles to deal with the fatal shooting of his ex-wife. American drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Pauley Perrette and Joe Spano.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A covert identity created for one of Gibbs' undercover cases 20 years previously resurfaces after a murder victim is found to be using the alias. programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs sends Quinn and Bishop to Philadelphia to investigate when the murder of a petty officer is linked to the disappearance of an MI6 agent.(n)

programme.title: NCIS

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: With the help of cult leader Bret Stiles (recurring guest star Malcolm McDowell), Patrick orchestrates an elaborate plan to break Lorelei Martins out of prison - making it look as if she kidnapped him before going on the run. While Lisbon and Homeland Security agent Robert Kirkland attempt to rescue Patrick, he tries to earn Lorelei's trust so that he can finally catch serial killer Red John. Starring Simon Baker, who also directs this episode.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The CBI investigates the murder of an estate agent who used to be in a gang. While his sister swears that he hasn't been involved in such activity for several years, further enquiries reveal that the leader had beat him up recently and was trying to find him on the night of the killing. Elsewhere, Jane searches for leads on his new connection to serial killer Red John.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and Jane are called to a rock-climbing wall at a gym, where the dead body of Jeremy Reese is dangling in mid-air. They discover that the victim was a botanist working on a new strain of marijuana resistant to fungal infection. Some of the seeds had recently gone missing and Reese's bank statements show large deposits from a company registered in the Cayman Islands. Had he been trying to sell commercial secrets to a tobacco firm? Simon Baker stars.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon reopens the case of billionaire philanthropist Tommy Volker, a man she believes orchestrated the deaths of two people who were attempting to expose his shady dealings. However, her persistence doesn't sit well with Volker, who informs her that he knows more about her than she thinks. Meanwhile, Jane begins to investigate the murder of up-and-coming model Charlotte Coates, whose body was found outside the rehab centre she was attending. He soon unearths two prime suspects in the form of a fellow patient and Charlotte's counsellor. Drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The team goes in search of a missing child who could prove to be an invaluable witness in the detectives' long-standing attempt to bring billionaire businessman Tommy Volker to justice. Drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: When scientists unlock the secret to immortality, time becomes the new currency and one desperate man comes under attack from a mysterious group known only as the "Time Keepers." In the not-too-distant future, scientists have discovered a way to turn off the aging gene. As the threat of overpopulation looms over society, money becomes a thing of the past. Now, assets are measured in time; those with the most time also possess the most power. Meanwhile, the lower classes are forced to barter with the new elite if they want to live forever. Suddenly a young commoner stumbles across a treasure chest of time. With the "Time Keepers" in hot pursuit, however, he may never get a chance to use it. Justin Timberlake, Amanda Seyfried, and Olivia Wilde star in this sci-fi thriller from writer/director Andrew Niccol (Gattaca, Lord of War)(n)

Comedy, with Billy Crystal, Bette Midler and Marisa Tomei.(n)

programme.title: Robots
programme.desc: Rodney the robot heads for the city, hoping to find an investor for his latest invention. Instead, he winds up clashing with an evil business mogul intent on stopping a manufacturer from making spare parts needed for ageing robots - so Rodney teams up with assorted rusty rejects to put the matter right. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ewan McGregor, Halle Berry, Robin Williams, Greg Kinnear and Amanda Bynes.(n)

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: A party of explorers studying the sunken remains of the famous liner meets an elderly woman who was a passenger on the ill-fated maiden voyage. She recounts how she boarded the ship while on the brink of being forced into marriage by her family, and was stopped from killing herself by a penniless artist. She fell in love with her saviour, but the disaster on the horizon meant their time together was doomed to be short. James Cameron's Oscar-winning romantic drama, starring Kate Winslet, Leonardo DiCaprio, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates and Bill Paxton.(n)

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: A tough female pirate enlists the help of an educated slave in finding the three parts of a map leading to buried treasure. However, one of the pieces is in the hands of her cruel uncle, and she also has to find the loot before her crew mutinies or the British Navy catches up with her. Swashbuckling adventure, starring Geena Davis, Matthew Modine, Frank Langella and Maury Chaykin.(n)

programme.title: Taken 2

He is able to escape with the aid of his daughter, and together they fight to rescue Lenore and wipe out the criminal family. Action thriller sequel, starring Liam Neeson, Maggie Grace and Famke Janssen.(n)

programme.title: Dredd
programme.desc: An uncompromising law enforcer in a post-apocalyptic city is assigned to train a psychic new recruit. A report of three murders leads them to a tower block dominated by a ruthless drug lord, only for the gangster to seal off the building, forcing them to fight their way out. Sci-fi thriller based on the 2000AD comic-strip, starring Karl Urban, Lena Headey and Olivia Thirlby.(n)

programme.title: The Moth Diaries

A series of unexplained deaths and strange changes in Lucy's personality leaves Rebecca convinced that the new arrival is a vampire whom she must destroy. Horror, starring Sarah Bolger, Sarah Gadon and Lily Cole.(n)

programme.title: The Pact

Horror, starring Caity Lotz and Casper Van Dien.(n)

programme.title: Bollywood Queen

Romantic musical comedy, starring Preeya Kalidas and James McAvoy.(n)

programme.title: A Monster in Paris

As the scientist and his sidekick try to find their creation before the police do, the creature befriends a kindly cabaret singer, who discovers he has a gentle nature and a gift for music. Animated comedy, with the voices of Vanessa Paradis and Sean Lennon.(n)

programme.title: The Piglet Files
programme.desc: Drummond is outraged when he is replaced by a woman, and Piglet is determined to see him reinstated.(n)

programme.title: The Piglet Files
programme.desc: Nicholas Lyndhurst stars as a recently appointed MI5 agent with the codename Piglet in this bungling spy drama.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin is horrified to find Paul has bought a neighbour's house and is planning to rent it out. Comedy, starring Richard Briers.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Gordon receives a mysterious package from South America, and his personal fitness programmes are a little too near the mark for the staff. Comedy, starring Chris Barrie.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Will Stella Find True Love with Norris Fairburn?.
programme.desc: After suffering a brush with Stella, Hobbo comes to the conclusion that it is time to find her a man - and, with the help of Clegg and Truly, he decides that eligible village heart-throb Norris Fairburn is the right match. Pearl's new-found passion for motorcycling causes trouble for Howard and Marina.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Will Randolph Make a Good Impression?.
programme.desc: Hobbo's quest to find a man for Stella leads him to put up an advertisement, but the suitor who turns up lacks what it takes to tackle the widow and runs off. However, a chance to hit back emerges when Hobbo finds out who Stella's favourite movie character is.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: In Which Romance Springs a Leak.
programme.desc: When Hobbo learns that Howard feels he is taken for granted by Pearl and that Toby misses his former wife, he hatches a plan to sort out their love lives - with the help of flowers, a Mario Lanza recording and his own team of miming violinists.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Gordon receives a mysterious package from South America, and his personal fitness programmes are a little too near the mark for the staff. Comedy, starring Chris Barrie.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: The inmates are shocked to discover there is a thief in their midst, so Fletcher decides to stage a mock trial to bring the culprit to justice with the help of Slade's resident legal consultant Judge Rawley. Classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker, Richard Beckinsale and Maurice Denham.(n)

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Granville changes his image with the help of some trendy clothes, sunglasses and a medallion made from a cocoa tin lid, while Arkwright decides to increase his profits through advertising. Comedy, with Ronnie Barker and David Jason.(n)

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom draws on every resource in his efforts to practise self-sufficiency and builds a generator that runs on animal dung. Comedy, starring Richard Briers and Felicity Kendal.(n)

programme.title: The Vicar of Dibley
programme.desc: A funeral for a pet bird inspires Geraldine to transform the church into an ark and hold a special service for the animals of the village - but David is far from impressed by her stunt. Comedy, starring Dawn French and Gary Waldhorn.(n)

programme.desc: A funeral for a pet bird inspires Geraldine to transform the church into an ark and hold a special service for the animals of the village - but David is far from impressed by her stunt. Comedy, starring Dawn French and Gary Waldhorn.(n)

programme.title: Still Open All Hours
programme.desc: Granville tries to sell a huge wheel of cheese which is long past its sell by date. Leroy gets sick of delivering goods by bicycle and demands his father invest in a van - and Gastric is on hand to sell them a suitable vehicle. Mrs Featherstone makes some frightening suggestions to Mr Newbold about taking their relationship further.(n)

programme.title: Spaced
programme.desc: Two disillusioned twenty-somethings, one a broken-hearted skateboarder and comic-book artist, the other an aspiring journalist, are brought together by fate as they search for accommodation in London. Comedy, starring Simon Pegg and Jessica Hynes.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
programme.desc: Dermot's pre-marriage nerves get the better of him and he locks himself away in a cupboard, so it is up to Agnes, Father Quinn and best man Buster to try to calm him down. Meanwhile, Rory's secret is revealed to his mother. Bawdy comedy, starring Brendan O'Carroll and Paddy Houlihan.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
programme.desc: Newlyweds Dermot and Maria argue over whether they should buy their own home. Meanwhile, Grandad hopes to witness his own funeral, but Mrs Brown's plans go awry when she mistakes two Mormons - who have been stealing Father Quinn's parishioners - for the men who are supposed to be delivering the coffin. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: Richie and Eddie hear of a sure-fire way to make a lot of money on a horse race, but it isn't long before their plan lands them in trouble with the police, the local landlord and a one-legged Falklands veteran. Slapstick comedy, starring Rik Mayall and Adrian Edmondson.(n)

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: The pals look forward to celebrating Christmas, but an unexpected guest disrupts their plans as Richie suffers delusions of grandeur and the whole spirit of the festive season is jeopardised. Anarchic comedy, starring Adrian Edmondson and Rik Mayall.(n)

programme.title: The Mighty Boosh
programme.desc: Bob Fossil arranges for Ivan the bear to be taken to an Animal Offenders Institute after he exposes himself to the visitors - but Howard and Vince will have their work cut out getting him there in one piece without falling foul of the Hitcher.(n)

programme.title: The Mighty Boosh
programme.desc: Howard is determined to make history by finding a legendary yeti - and is even prepared to trade Vince for directions to its lair. However, his plan backfires when he is taken prisoner by the monster, while his immaculately coiffured partner in crime is propositioned by an insane trapper. Starring Noel Fielding and Julian Barratt.(n)

programme.title: Limmy's Show
programme.desc: Brian Limond returns with more sketches, skits and animations presenting his very personal take on modern life. TV psychic Raymond Day brings a family together with info from beyond the grave, Jacqueline McCafferty gets competitive at a self-help group and Dee Dee allows his curiosity about a parcel to get the better of him.(n)

programme.title: Limmy's Show
programme.desc: Drug experimenter Larry Forsyth plucks up the courage to do battle with his interviewer, while Dee Dee bumps into a newsreader and contemplates national notoriety. Limmy keeps spotting one particular guy everywhere and he also lifts the lid on the secret lives of men and the intriguing things they get up to when no-one is looking. Plus, an easy task escalates out of control at the chemist's and there's some riveting chat on the go at a late-night house party.(n)

programme.title: The Armando Iannucci Shows
programme.desc: Armando Iannucci, the man responsible for The Day Today and I'm Alan Partridge, presents a comedy sketch show poking fun at people's feelings and fears.(n)

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: Richie and Eddie hear of a sure-fire way to make a lot of money on a horse race, but it isn't long before their plan lands them in trouble with the police, the local landlord and a one-legged Falklands veteran. Slapstick comedy, starring Rik Mayall and Adrian Edmondson.(n)

programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Piglet Files
programme.desc: Nicholas Lyndhurst stars as a recently appointed MI5 agent with the codename Piglet in this bungling spy drama.(n)

programme.title: Waiting for God
programme.desc: Tom decides to go on hunger strike at the Bayview Retirement Village until the standard of food improves. First episode of the sitcom, starring Stephanie Cole and Graham Crowden.(n)

programme.title: To the Manor Born
programme.desc: Audrey moves out of Grantleigh Manor, and Richard and his mother move in, disappointing the former resident with their new ways. Comedy, starring Penelope Keith and Peter Bowles.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Beware of Laughing at Nora's Hats.
programme.desc: Alvin tries to persuade Nora Batty to go for a ride in his sidecar, but she's having none of it. When she relates the story of her long-standing feud with Audrey Craig - who had the audacity to laugh at her hat during a wedding many years ago - it becomes clear the broom-brandishing battleaxe is not one to be messed with.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Yours Truly - If You're Not Careful.
programme.desc: Billy and Alvin learn that Truly's ex-wife is trying to find him, and waste no time in gleefully tormenting their pal with the news of a strange woman's appearance in town. Long-running comedy, starring Peter Sallis and Frank Thornton.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Clegg, Truly, Alvin and Billy encounter a stranger who is determined to travel by canal to Ilkley in an inflatable swan. However, when punctures disrupt the man's dream, Entwistle is on hand to ensure the voyage goes to plan. Tommy Cannon and Bobby Ball guest star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Clegg's decision to write his memoirs causes Howard a great deal of concern, while Smiler is devastated when a blossoming relationship ends suddenly. Long-running comedy series, starring Peter Sallis, Robert Fyfe and Stephen Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: After a taste of the high life, Del-Boy and Rodney are back in Nelson Mandela House and back in business as Trotters Independent Traders. When they receive an invitation to a cross-Channel Navy reunion intended for dear-departed Uncle Albert, Del spies the opportunity to make a few quid on a booze cruise. The only problem is, Rodney is now the company's managing director and would never approve. David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, John Challis and Tessa Peake-Jones star in the 2002 Christmas special.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Raquel invites her estranged parents around for dinner, and Del-Boy is keen to make an impression - but a mix-up with the gravy boat puts a damper on proceedings. However, things soon take a turn for the better when Del's `father-in-law' finds an old watch among the Trotters' junk, which he claims could net them a pretty packet at auction. But nothing can quite prepare them for the shock they have in store. The final part of the Christmas 1996 trilogy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. Del-Boy embarks on a new romance with Raquel, an actress he meets through a computer dating agency, while Rodney takes `Nervous Nerys' out for a burn in the three-wheeler - but as ever with the Peckham twosome, nothing goes quite according to plan. Christmas special from 1988, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Tessa Peake-Jones.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Rodney leaves home after a fight with Cassandra, and arranges a date with receptionist Tanya in an effort to make his wife jealous - but Del's interference ensures the plan fails to go as smoothly as it should. Christmas special first shown in 1990, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: Patsy hits the headlines in a sleazy tabloid sex scandal, while melodramatic Edina demands hospital treatment for a trivial complaint. Comedy, with guest stars Mandy Rice-Davies, Helena Bonham Carter, Richard E Grant and Germaine Greer.(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.sub-title: Jack Dee Live at the Apollo: Jo Brand.
programme.desc: The deadpan host presents more comedy from the London theatre, recounting a traumatic experience at Disneyland before introducing a performance by Jo Brand, who vents her wrath on Big Brother and makeover specialists Trinny and Susannah.(n)

programme.title: The Young Ones
programme.desc: Neil falls ill, and Mike insists on isolating him in a plastic bag, while medical student Vyvyan demonstrates his unique bedside manner by suggesting a cure involving six-inch nails. Ben Elton's student sitcom, starring Rik Mayall, Nigel Planer, Adrian Edmondson and Christopher Ryan. Guest starring Madness.(n)

programme.title: Donut Showdown

programme.title: Donut Showdown
programme.desc: Canada-based bakers test their creativity and culinary skills in a series of challenges as they compete against one another to make the best doughnuts.(n)

programme.title: Eat Well for Less
programme.desc: The Guests from Loughborough eat a diet of convenience food that is not only unwholesome, it is also very expensive. Mum Lisa is aware she has to make her family more healthy, but is going about it the wrong way, buying into costly `superfoods' rather than good old-fashioned fruit and veg. Can Gregg and Chris help the Guests bring more variety to their plates - and in turn, knock a whopping 50 per cent off their shopping bill? Along the way, they also investigate how canned fish compares to fresh and which oil is best for cooking, as well as the diet cons to watch out for.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: Six new cooks take on two challenges. The first three begin with a Skills Test set by Marcus Wareing. They have 15 minutes to make a Buck Rarebit - a Welsh Rarebit with a fried egg on top. The remaining three contestants must complete a Skills Test set by Monica Galetti, who examines their butchery skills by asking them to joint a whole rabbit and prepare it for cooking. In the final challenge the six chefs cook their own Signature Dish, before the best three are put through to the quarter finals.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers: Mums Know Best
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers meet three keen cooks who demonstrate recipes for high tea. Farmer's wife Polly cooks beef and honey stew, and lamb and mint sausages, while Nancy Davis shares a transatlantic take on tea with her mother's meatloaf dish and potato salad. Lisa Hobson enlists the bikers' help to uncover the mysteries of a family recipe book, and the duo prepare savoury pies and a lemon curd Swiss roll.(n)

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking
programme.desc: The food writer turns his attention to surf and turf meals - fish combined with meat - demonstrating how to prepare classic recipes that are uncomplicated and easy to remember. He makes dishes including trout with Parma ham and lamb shanks with anchovies, before learning how a fisherman keeps his crew happy by cooking scallops with chorizo.(n)

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam
programme.desc: Luke visits the small town of Vinh, where he explores the vibrant market lifestyle and local food.(n)

programme.title: John Torode's Korean Food Tour
programme.desc: John heads into the Korean kitchen to find out more about essentials like soy, gochujang and doenjang, before making bossam, a fantastic belly pork dish.(n)

programme.title: James Martin: Yorkshire's Finest
programme.desc: The chef heads to the famous Betty's tearooms in York, before preparing Yorkshire rarebit with apple and tomato chutney, and crumpets with fresh berries.(n)

programme.title: James Martin: Yorkshire's Finest
programme.desc: A visit to a Whitby kipper-smoking establishment prompts the chef to make a variety of fish dishes, including pate and smoked haddock omelette.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Super Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver studies the diets of the places that have the most centenarians in the world, before providing healthy recipes that can be cooked at home. In Costa Rica, he meets, cooks and eats with five generations of the same family, including 106-year-old Jose, while on the Greek island of Ikaria 84-year-old goat farmer Nikos gives him clues to the secrets of the locals' long lives. Back in the UK, Jamie creates a day's worth of nutritious and tasty meals, including griddled steak with toasted nuts and grilled peppers.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Super Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the Nicoyan Peninsula in Costa Rica, where he joins fisherman Otto for a meal of freshly caught fish with family and friends on the beach. In Okinawa, an island 400 miles off the coast of Japan, Jamie joins a 74-year-old grand karate master to learn some moves before lunch, which features popular local ingredient sweet potato. Back in the UK, Jamie creates nutritious and tasty meals, including cheese and corn pancakes topped with smoky bacon and caramelised banana; fish tacos, and chicken and sweet potato cacciatore, with mushrooms, tomatoes, olives and bread.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Super Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver travels to the Greek island of Ikaria, where he forages for wild greens and herbs with local cook Tula, before preparing a healthy hilltop feast with four generations of her family. In Okinawa, Japan, Jamie joins local people for their early morning exercise and discovers the wonders of a local ancient ingredient.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Super Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver is on the Greek island of Ikaria, where he helps 84-year-old Giorgios work the land and enjoys a lunch overlooking the sea, before visiting a Costa Rican cattle ranch where he eats black beans - a superfood packed with protein and fibre. Recipes featured include sweet potato, chilli, cheese and seed muffins, carbonara with smoky bacon, peas, almonds and basil, and smoky black bean stew with squash, peppers, rice and chili salsa.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef visits Naples, Italy, where he discovers an abundance of seafood and rich colourful sauces, and later experiences North Sea cod with cabbage and beer in Suffolk.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef reproduces popular local fish dishes in Goa, and there is a visit to the kitchen of a Cornish restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: The globetrotting chef samples cuisine from Galicia in Spain, including a rare shellfish dish and hake cooked with peppers and saffron.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef catches turbot off the Cornish coast to take home and cook with cider and cream, then heads off to the Indian resort of Goa where he prepares local recipes including prawn caldene and spicy Goan lobster.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef returns to Queensland in Australia, where 30 years ago on his first visit, a lamb chop was the most adventurous food on the menu. Today the place is bursting with exciting fish dishes, so Rick heads for the beach to whip up a spicy squid salad, and smoked bream with a tangy bush tucker chutney.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: Rick goes bass fishing in Chesapeake Bay in America, cooks oysters on Bowen Island and then prepares crab in Thailand.(n)

programme.desc: The chef returns to Queensland in Australia, where 30 years ago on his first visit, a lamb chop was the most adventurous food on the menu. Today the place is bursting with exciting fish dishes, so Rick heads for the beach to whip up a spicy squid salad, and smoked bream with a tangy bush tucker chutney.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: Rick goes bass fishing in Chesapeake Bay in America, cooks oysters on Bowen Island and then prepares crab in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Super Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver studies the diets of the places that have the most centenarians in the world, before providing healthy recipes that can be cooked at home. In Costa Rica, he meets, cooks and eats with five generations of the same family, including 106-year-old Jose, while on the Greek island of Ikaria 84-year-old goat farmer Nikos gives him clues to the secrets of the locals' long lives. Back in the UK, Jamie creates a day's worth of nutritious and tasty meals, including griddled steak with toasted nuts and grilled peppers.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Super Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the Nicoyan Peninsula in Costa Rica, where he joins fisherman Otto for a meal of freshly caught fish with family and friends on the beach. Back in the UK, Jamie creates nutritious and tasty meals, including cheese and corn pancakes topped with smoky bacon and caramelised banana; fish tacos, and chicken and sweet potato cacciatore, with mushrooms, tomatoes, olives and bread.(n)

programme.title: Tour de Pharmacy
programme.desc: Sports-doping spoof focusing on a fictional, world-class cycling event in 1982 that was marred by one controversy after another, as recalled by five riders, commentators, celebrities and other assorted ne'er-do-wells(n)

programme.title: The Princess Diaries
programme.desc: This teen comedy from Disney is based on a popular novel by Meg Cabot and directed by Garry Marshall. Mia Thermopolis (Anne Hathaway) is a teenage klutz who's openly mocked by the popular Lana Thomas (pop singer Mandy Moore). In fact, Mia's only friend at her exclusive prep school is the socially outcast Lilly (Heather Matarazzo). Mia's life takes a dramatic turn, however, when her mom announces that her late biological father was in actuality the crown prince of a small European nation, Genovia. Now Mia is the sole heir to the throne, and her grandmother, Queen Clarisse Renaldi (Julie Andrews) wants to tutor the awkward teen in royal behavior. It's a daunting task given Mia's lax table manners, poise, and hair care, but the girl perseveres with some makeover help from her grandmother's security chief Hector Elizondo) and a style expert (Larry Miller). In the meantime, Mia's romantic affections are torn between the handsome, popular Josh (Erik Von Detten) and the more appropriate Michael (Robert Schwartzman), who also happens to be Lilly's brother. The Princess Diaries is the second film from Whitney Houston's production shingle after the television version of Rodgers and Hammerstein's Cinderella (1997)(n)

programme.title: Necessary Roughness
programme.desc: Riotous comedy about the disparate band of non-athletic students called upon to form a thoroughly unconventional college football team when the Dean of Admissions cancels the school's sporting scholarship. The two coaches, Hector Elizondo and Robert Loggia, are forced to piece together a winning team from what 'talent' is left on campus, a motley bunch of misfits led by a 34-year-old student (Scott Bakula), a female kicker and a military-obsessed full-back(n)

programme.title: Flipped
programme.desc: A young schoolboy realizes that the same girl he struggled to avoid may actually be his one true love in this coming-of-age romantic comedy from director Rob Reiner. Adapted from the book by Wendelin Van Draanen, Flipped tells the story of mischievous schoolboy Bryce (Callan McAuliffe) and his neighbor Juli (Madeline Carroll), who's had a crush on her girl-phobic classmate since second grade. Over the course of six years, Juli pines for Bryce as he does everything in his power to put her off. Later, as the pair enters junior high, Bryce discovers girls and the tide starts to shift. But will Juli still be interested after all that Bryce has done to keep her at arm's length? Rebecca De Mornay, Aidan Quinn, Anthony Edwards, and Penelope Ann Miller co-star(n)

programme.title: Powder
programme.desc: A strange young man changes the lives of those around him in this emotional and mystical drama. The man in question is Powder, a hairless, albino youth who has strange kinetic powers. After his grandfather's death, he is sent to a school where his abilities get him into trouble(n)

programme.title: Solaris
programme.desc: Steven Soderbergh's remake of the classic Andrei Torkovsky film stars George Clooney as the therapist sent to mentor a group of astronauts on the Prometheus space station, where the remaining crew are both locked in their own fears, speaking of visions of lost loved ones. At first sceptical, when Clooney's lost wife appears to him, he begins to wonder what influence the mysterious planet Solaris has on the human psyche(n)

programme.title: Over Her Dead Body
programme.desc: This spirited romp is a throwback to classic screwball comedies of the 1930s and '40s. Eva Longoria Parker is a scream as a bride who suffers a fatal accident during her wedding, and later returns as a ghost to keep her husband from taking a new lover. Paul Rudd is outstanding as her husband; Lake Bell is a treat as the new woman in his life, a caterer who doubles as a psychic; and Lindsay Sloane is impressive as his kooky sister, Chloe. Written and directed by Jeff Lowell(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This fascinating reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor, the assistant of Victor Frankenstein. When the scientist builds an undead creature that turns dangerous, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz(n)

programme.desc: Crude Reality & Between Oil and Water. programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: A trio of filmmakers on what should have been a simple walk in the woods, quickly becomes an excursion into heart-stopping terror. As the three become inexplicably lost, morale deteriorates. Hunger sets in. Accusations fly. By night, unseen evil stirsbeyond their campfire's light. By day, chilling ritualistic figures are discovered nearby. As the end of their journey approaches, they realize that what they are filming now is not a legend...but their own descent into unimaginable horror(n)
