An examination of the past, present and future of U.S. foreign policy and how post-Cold War alliances have shifted features conversations with diplomats, politicians and scholars, including Council on Foreign Relations president Richard Haass; former secretary of state Condoleezza Rice; former British prime minister Tony Blair; former UN ambassador Samantha Power; political scientist Francis Fukayama; and Sen. Chris Murphy (D-Conn.)(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: Segments include an interview with Chechen leader and MMA figure Ramzan Kadyrov; a look at global warming's effect on the Great Barrier Reef; a visit with MLB Hall of Famer Rod Carew, who underwent a heart and kidney transplant last December(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Stormborn. Daenerys and her new advisers map out a strategy to conquer Westeros, and a surprise visitor counsels her to summon Jon Snow to Dragonstone. Meanwhile, a reunion in the Riverlands causes Arya to change course; Cersei continues her desperate search for allies; and Sam thinks he's found a cure for a deadly ailment(n)

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: A loner protecting a baby from hit men(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Seeds of Expansion. Season 3 begins with Spencer looking to score some high-profile clients to pay off his debts, but he hits a roadblock when Mr. Anderson wants to focus on the Las Vegas market by partnering with a casino magnate. Meanwhile, Ricky ponders fatherhood; Vernon and Reggie eye an edgy endorsement; and Larry makes Charles the face of bad news at a team press conference(n)

programme.title: Diana, Our Mother: Her Life and Legacy
programme.desc: Nearly 20 years after her death, Princess Diana's sons, Prince William and Prince Harry, recall their mother's influence on their lives, her public persona and her humanitarian work as they leaf through a private family album(n)

programme.title: Tour de Pharmacy
programme.desc: Sports-doping spoof focusing on a fictional, world-class cycling event in 1982 that was marred by one controversy after another, as recalled by five riders, commentators, celebrities and other assorted ne'er-do-wells(n)

programme.title: The Princess Diaries
programme.desc: This teen comedy from Disney is based on a popular novel by Meg Cabot and directed by Garry Marshall. Mia Thermopolis (Anne Hathaway) is a teenage klutz who's openly mocked by the popular Lana Thomas (pop singer Mandy Moore). In fact, Mia's only friend at her exclusive prep school is the socially outcast Lilly (Heather Matarazzo). Mia's life takes a dramatic turn, however, when her mom announces that her late biological father was in actuality the crown prince of a small European nation, Genovia. Now Mia is the sole heir to the throne, and her grandmother, Queen Clarisse Renaldi (Julie Andrews) wants to tutor the awkward teen in royal behavior. It's a daunting task given Mia's lax table manners, poise, and hair care, but the girl perseveres with some makeover help from her grandmother's security chief Hector Elizondo) and a style expert (Larry Miller). In the meantime, Mia's romantic affections are torn between the handsome, popular Josh (Erik Von Detten) and the more appropriate Michael (Robert Schwartzman), who also happens to be Lilly's brother. The Princess Diaries is the second film from Whitney Houston's production shingle after the television version of Rodgers and Hammerstein's Cinderella (1997)(n)

programme.title: Necessary Roughness
programme.desc: Riotous comedy about the disparate band of non-athletic students called upon to form a thoroughly unconventional college football team when the Dean of Admissions cancels the school's sporting scholarship. The two coaches, Hector Elizondo and Robert Loggia, are forced to piece together a winning team from what 'talent' is left on campus, a motley bunch of misfits led by a 34-year-old student (Scott Bakula), a female kicker and a military-obsessed full-back(n)

programme.title: Flipped
programme.desc: A young schoolboy realizes that the same girl he struggled to avoid may actually be his one true love in this coming-of-age romantic comedy from director Rob Reiner. Adapted from the book by Wendelin Van Draanen, Flipped tells the story of mischievous schoolboy Bryce (Callan McAuliffe) and his neighbor Juli (Madeline Carroll), who's had a crush on her girl-phobic classmate since second grade. Over the course of six years, Juli pines for Bryce as he does everything in his power to put her off. Later, as the pair enters junior high, Bryce discovers girls and the tide starts to shift. But will Juli still be interested after all that Bryce has done to keep her at arm's length? Rebecca De Mornay, Aidan Quinn, Anthony Edwards, and Penelope Ann Miller co-star(n)

programme.title: Powder
programme.desc: A strange young man changes the lives of those around him in this emotional and mystical drama. The man in question is Powder, a hairless, albino youth who has strange kinetic powers. After his grandfather's death, he is sent to a school where his abilities get him into trouble(n)

programme.title: Solaris
programme.desc: Steven Soderbergh's remake of the classic Andrei Torkovsky film stars George Clooney as the therapist sent to mentor a group of astronauts on the Prometheus space station, where the remaining crew are both locked in their own fears, speaking of visions of lost loved ones. At first sceptical, when Clooney's lost wife appears to him, he begins to wonder what influence the mysterious planet Solaris has on the human psyche(n)

programme.title: Over Her Dead Body
programme.desc: This spirited romp is a throwback to classic screwball comedies of the 1930s and '40s. Eva Longoria Parker is a scream as a bride who suffers a fatal accident during her wedding, and later returns as a ghost to keep her husband from taking a new lover. Paul Rudd is outstanding as her husband; Lake Bell is a treat as the new woman in his life, a caterer who doubles as a psychic; and Lindsay Sloane is impressive as his kooky sister, Chloe. Written and directed by Jeff Lowell(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This fascinating reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor, the assistant of Victor Frankenstein. When the scientist builds an undead creature that turns dangerous, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: Crude Reality & Between Oil and Water
programme.desc: Crude Reality & Between Oil and Water. A report on South Sudan and how rampant corruption has brought the country to the brink of collapse just six years after winning independence; a chronicle of months of protesting by activists in North Dakota against the Dakota Access Pipeline(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Seeds of Expansion. Meanwhile, Ricky ponders fatherhood; Vernon and Reggie eye an edgy endorsement; and Larry makes Charles the face of bad news at a team press conference(n)

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: A trio of filmmakers on what should have been a simple walk in the woods, quickly becomes an excursion into heart-stopping terror. As the three become inexplicably lost, morale deteriorates. Hunger sets in. Accusations fly. By night, unseen evil stirsbeyond their campfire's light. By day, chilling ritualistic figures are discovered nearby. As the end of their journey approaches, they realize that what they are filming now is not a legend...but their own descent into unimaginable horror(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Joneses
programme.desc: A couple inadvertently gets involved in an international plot after finding out that their new neighbours, while they seem to be perfectly normal, are secretly government spies(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: In this horror sequel, Ed and Lorraine Warren investigate one of the UK's most-notorious hauntings(n)

programme.title: Tashi and the Monk
programme.desc: A visit to a home for orphans and abandoned children in northeastern India that was founded by a former Buddhist monk, who's reminded of his own troubled childhood by an unruly new arrival(n)

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: When a young fan pleads with her to help find her missing father, a timid children's author takes up the mantle of her swashbuckling fictional hero(n)

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: A stork and his human pal must team up to transport a baby girl to her expectant family, even though storks have long since gotten out of the baby delivery business ever since they started working as couriers for an internet merchant(n)

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Battle of the Chefs. Chris and Elmo help Alan compete in "Cast Iron Cook" challenges(n)

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Big Bird's Big Move. Freddy Flapman, a real-estate agent to birds, tries to convince Big Bird to relocate somewhere else besides Sesame Street(n)

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' Horton Hears a Who!
programme.desc: It is story of a faithful, sharp-eared elephant trying to save a microscopic world only he can hear come to life(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Lonely kid Nicholas Hoult finds a reluctant father figure in detached bachelor Hugh Grant in this heartwarming comedy based on a book by Nick Hornby. With Toni Collette(n)

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, the illusionists known as the Four Horsemen return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their names and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul. However, the mogul soon turns the tables, and forces the group to steal a revolutionary decrypting device for him(n)

programme.title: Diana, Our Mother: Her Life and Legacy
programme.desc: Nearly 20 years after her death, Princess Diana's sons, Prince William and Prince Harry, recall their mother's influence on their lives, her public persona and her humanitarian work as they leaf through a private family album(n)

programme.title: Mr. Woodcock
programme.desc: A successful self-help author comes home for a visit, only to find his mother engaged to his sadistic former gym teacher. Billy Bob Thornton, Susan Sarandon and Seann William Scott star in this outrageous farce. Directed by Craig Gillespie(n)

programme.title: Soul Food
programme.desc: Warm and touching family drama centred around a plentifully stocked dinner table. Mamma Joe, the matriarch of an extended African American family, lays on famous Sunday 'soul food' feasts at which the family come together and resolve their differences. However, when Mamma Joe falls ill the family begins to fracture, leaving one young man, Ahmad - through whose eyes the story is told - trying to keep the relatives from descending into all-out war(n)

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: In this heartwarming comedy-drama, an African-American widower asks his family to join him for their first Christmas since his wife died. However, having all of them under one roof leads to a number of personal confrontations as secrets are revealed and marriages are tested(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Hella Great. Issa struggles in the aftermath of her breakup with Lawrence, while facing challenges at a new work assignment, as Season 2 begins. Meanwhile, Molly questions her worth at work; and Lawrence adjusts to his new living arrangement(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Straight Outta Compton'
programme.desc: A look at "Straight Outta Compton," a 2015 drama that chronicles the history of the hip-hop group NWA in 1980s California. The film stars Jason Mitchell, Corey Hawkins, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Aldis Hodge and Neil Brown Jr., and is directed by F. Gary Gray(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Years after leaving the jungle and settling down with his wife Jane in London, Tarzan returns to the Congo to act as a trade representative for England(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz(n)

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Mobster Chili Palmer ditches the movie business for the music industry when he decides to manage a singer in this sequel(n)

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: While Christmas shopping in New York for their respective partners, Jonathan and Sara meet by chance and fall in love before the day is over. At the end of the evening, Sara jumps in a cab and leaves, saying that if they are meant to be together, fate will find a way. Years later, as both are ready to marry different partners, destiny does indeed bring them back together and they rekindle their love(n)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: Selfish publicist Stu Shepherd answers a ringing phone in the street. Not only does the man on the line know his name, but he's also got a sniper's rifle pointed directly at Stu(n)

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
programme.desc: After a family tragedy, a boy named Jake follows a series of clues that lead him to a mysterious orphanage on a remote Welsh island. There, he discovers a community of children with unusual abilities, and learns he is destined to protect them(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Michael Bay returns to helm the sequel to the highly successful big-screen adaptation of the Transformers toy line for DreamWorks and Paramount Pictures. Much of the original cast returns for the second installment, including Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Tyrese Gibson, and John Turturro, with Rainn Wilson joining in the fun as a college professor(n)

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: The spy spoof series gets the big screen treatment with this action comedy starring Steve Carell and Anne Hathaway. Agents 86, 99, and 23 lead Control against the evil entity KAOS(n)

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: After receiving disturbing letters from a stalker, a famous singer bolsters her protection with the aid of a stoic bodyguard. Romantic drama(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: A look at the dangerous world of camel racing; a report on the debate over Native American mascots; and a study of the injury rate among cheerleaders. Correspondents include Bernard Goldberg and Frank Deford(n)

programme.desc: Part 4. Part 4 of 4. Dre produces Eminem's "The Slim Shady LP" that takes the rap music world by storm. Later, Dre and Jimmy create Beats Electronics and make a historic 2014 deal with Apple(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Biopic about Virginian interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving, whose arrest in 1958 for violating the state's miscegenation laws eventually led to a landmark Supreme Court decision(n)

programme.title: Diana, Our Mother: Her Life and Legacy
programme.desc: Nearly 20 years after her death, Princess Diana's sons, Prince William and Prince Harry, recall their mother's influence on their lives, her public persona and her humanitarian work as they leaf through a private family album(n)

programme.title: HBO First Look: 'War for the Planet of the Apes'
programme.desc: A look at "War for the Planet of the Apes," a 2017 thriller about an ape army's struggle against homo sapiens. The film stars Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn, and is directed by Matt Reeves(n)

programme.title: Formula 51
programme.desc: Samuel L Jackson plays a pharmaceutical genius who has used his knowledge to make a fortune in illegal drugs, particularly with Formula 51, named after its potency above heroin, crack, anything. But instead of selling it to his drug lord employer, he jets to Liverpool where Robert Carlyle is acting as broker for Ricky Tomlinson, who's prepared to offer $20m for the formula - money Jackson would love to spend if he can stay alive long enough in Ronny Yu's fast moving crime thriller(n)
Ants develop super intelligence and kill the two scientists sent to study them. Sci-fi horror(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: This exhilarating spin-off of "Snow White and the Huntsman" acts as both prequel and sequel to the original film, detailing the adventures of Eric the Huntsman as he gets caught up in the rivalry between wicked queens Ravenna and Freya. During his quest, Eric is also endangered by his feelings for fellow warrior Sara, since ice queen Freya has decreed that love is forbidden in her kingdom(n)

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love
programme.desc: Tom Stoppard provided the witty and intelligent script for John Madden's romantic comedy in which young Will Shakespeare struggles with writer's block and money worries while trying to complete Romeo and Ethel: The Pirate's Daughter. Gwyneth Paltrow once more employs her faultless English accent, playing aristocratic Viola de Lesseps, who is shortly to be married off but yearns to slum it as an actor. Disguising herself as a boy in order to be allowed on stage, Viola becomes Will's muse, and the more familiar tale of Romeo and Juliet begins to take shape as the couple fall passionately in love. The film is littered with knowing lines and energetically supported by a stellar cast, including Judy Dench as Queen Elizabeth - a cameo performance which earned her one of the movie's seven Oscars(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: A World in Disarray. An examination of the past, present and future of U.S. foreign policy and how post-Cold War alliances have shifted features conversations with diplomats, politicians and scholars, including Council on Foreign Relations president Richard Haass; former secretary of state Condoleezza Rice; former British prime minister Tony Blair; former UN ambassador Samantha Power; political scientist Francis Fukayama; and Sen. Chris Murphy (D-Conn.)(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's eight Oscar- and seven BAFTA-winning blockbuster opens as Jamal Malik, a chaiwalah at a call centre, is on the verge of winning 20 million rupees on Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? But the host of the show, Prem Kumar is convinced he's cheating and hands him over to the police to beat the truth out of him. Jamal reveals that the right answer to each question has come from a significant part of his life, from when he and his brother Salim were orphaned after their mother was killed in religious violence. Along the way, Jamal falls in love with Latika, an orphaned girl, but the pair become separated. Meanwhile his brother Salim takes the path of violence as a gangster's gunman. But as Jamal is returned to the studio for the last question, Salim finally repays his brother's trust, setting up an emotional, joyous climax. As well as the outstanding Patel, Jamal is played in different stages of life by Tanay Hemant Gharu and Ayush Mahesh Khedekar; Salim is played by Madhur Mittal, Ashutosh Lobo Gajiwala and Azharuddin Mohammed Ismail; Latika is played by Frieda Pinto, Tanvi Ganesh Lonkar and Rubina Ali, all of whom turn in stunning performances. English/ Hindi with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: An American family living in India are devastated when their young son is killed in an accident. The wife (Sarah Wayne Callies) soon performs a ritual at a Hindu temple that will let her speak to the dead, but her actions cause her family to be haunted by an otherworldly force. Jeremy Sisto, Logan Creran, Sofia Rosinsky, and Suchitra Pillai co-star. Directed by Johannes Roberts(n)

programme.title: Harold & Kumar Escape From Guantanamo Bay
programme.desc: Friends Harold and Kumar decide to take a trip to Amsterdam when Harold finds out that his beloved Maria is heading to the city. After a few incidents at the airport, they finally get on the plane, but once again create more trouble when Kumar lights up his new bong and the air marshals think it's a bomb. Next stop: Guantanamo Bay prison, in Cuba. And the problems have just started..(n)

programme.desc: Tom Stoppard provided the witty and intelligent script for John Madden's romantic comedy in which young Will Shakespeare struggles with writer's block and money worries while trying to complete Romeo and Ethel: The Pirate's Daughter. Gwyneth Paltrow once more employs her faultless English accent, playing aristocratic Viola de Lesseps, who is shortly to be married off but yearns to slum it as an actor. Disguising herself as a boy in order to be allowed on stage, Viola becomes Will's muse, and the more familiar tale of Romeo and Juliet begins to take shape as the couple fall passionately in love. The film is littered with knowing lines and energetically supported by a stellar cast, including Judy Dench as Queen Elizabeth - a cameo performance which earned her one of the movie's seven Oscars(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: A World in Disarray. An examination of the past, present and future of U.S. foreign policy and how post-Cold War alliances have shifted features conversations with diplomats, politicians and scholars, including Council on Foreign Relations president Richard Haass; former secretary of state Condoleezza Rice; former British prime minister Tony Blair; former UN ambassador Samantha Power; political scientist Francis Fukayama; and Sen. Chris Murphy (D-Conn.)(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's eight Oscar- and seven BAFTA-winning blockbuster opens as Jamal Malik, a chaiwalah at a call centre, is on the verge of winning 20 million rupees on Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? But the host of the show, Prem Kumar is convinced he's cheating and hands him over to the police to beat the truth out of him. Jamal reveals that the right answer to each question has come from a significant part of his life, from when he and his brother Salim were orphaned after their mother was killed in religious violence. Along the way, Jamal falls in love with Latika, an orphaned girl, but the pair become separated. Meanwhile his brother Salim takes the path of violence as a gangster's gunman. But as Jamal is returned to the studio for the last question, Salim finally repays his brother's trust, setting up an emotional, joyous climax. As well as the outstanding Patel, Jamal is played in different stages of life by Tanay Hemant Gharu and Ayush Mahesh Khedekar; Salim is played by Madhur Mittal, Ashutosh Lobo Gajiwala and Azharuddin Mohammed Ismail; Latika is played by Frieda Pinto, Tanvi Ganesh Lonkar and Rubina Ali, all of whom turn in stunning performances. English/ Hindi with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: Crude Reality & Between Oil and Water
programme.desc: Crude Reality & Between Oil and Water. A report on South Sudan and how rampant corruption has brought the country to the brink of collapse just six years after winning independence; a chronicle of months of protesting by activists in North Dakota against the Dakota Access Pipeline(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Hella Great. Issa struggles in the aftermath of her breakup with Lawrence, while facing challenges at a new work assignment, as Season 2 begins. Meanwhile, Molly questions her worth at work; and Lawrence adjusts to his new living arrangement(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Now fully recovered from his amnesia, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne attempts to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Seeds of Expansion. Season 3 begins with Spencer looking to score some high-profile clients to pay off his debts, but he hits a roadblock when Mr. Anderson wants to focus on the Las Vegas market by partnering with a casino magnate. Meanwhile, Ricky ponders fatherhood; Vernon and Reggie eye an edgy endorsement; and Larry makes Charles the face of bad news at a team press conference(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Stormborn. Daenerys and her new advisers map out a strategy to conquer Westeros, and a surprise visitor counsels her to summon Jon Snow to Dragonstone. Meanwhile, a reunion in the Riverlands causes Arya to change course; Cersei continues her desperate search for allies; and Sam thinks he's found a cure for a deadly ailment(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Hella Great. Issa struggles in the aftermath of her breakup with Lawrence, while facing challenges at a new work assignment, as Season 2 begins. Meanwhile, Molly questions her worth at work; and Lawrence adjusts to his new living arrangement(n)

programme.title: Room 104
programme.desc: Ralphie. Extraordinary stories that occur in a single room at a nondescript U.S. motel over the course of several decades are told in this anthology series, which begins with a babysitter arriving at Room 104 to watch an unusual boy(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: In this horror sequel, Ed and Lorraine Warren investigate one of the UK's most-notorious hauntings(n)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Teen-angst comedy drama about five school kids - an athlete, a spoiled rich kid, a brainy nerd, an introverted loner and a rebellious punk - who are brought together on a day-long detention. Despite their original hostilities, and a psychotic teacher, the motley crew break the rules, bare their souls and find they have more in common than just attending the same high school(n)

programme.title: One Night Stand
programme.desc: Colin Quinn. Colin Quinn offers his brand of street rap, complaining about his "pathetic" life, '70s sitcoms, Jean-Claude Van Damme films(n)

programme.title: Puerto Ricans in Paris
programme.desc: Two Puerto Rican NYC cops are asked by a pair of French fashion designers to come to Paris to hunt down the counterfeiters who stole a couture handbag(n)

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Spike Lee received an Oscar nomination for his screenplay about racial tensions in a New York City neighbourhood(n)

programme.title: Tracey Ullman in the Trailer Tales
programme.desc: Unlike her earlier comedy series and specials, in which she "took on" dozens of vivid and distinct characterizations, Tracey Ullman focuses herein on only three of her famous alter egos. First and foremost is faded glamour gal Ruby Romaine, veteran Hollywood cosmetician and shameless dispenser of libelous gossip. In her efforts to gain re-entry into Local 706 of the Hair and Makeup Guild, the heavily wrinkled Ruby crosses paths with two other Ullman creations, Russian émigré Svetlana and actress Pepper Kane, a black woman trying to pass as white (not surprisingly, both ladies are prime targets for Ruby's unending stream of ethnic slurs). Somehow or other, Ruby's return to her days of glory also brings her in contact with such real-life popular culture icons as Debbie Reynolds, Barbara Bain, Cheech Marin, Rose Marie, Jane Kaczmarek, and former Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In producer George Schlatter(n)

programme.title: Hollywood Ending
programme.desc: A down-on-his luck auteur gets one more chance at the big time -- provided his neuroses don't swallow him whole -- in Woody Allen's 33rd feature release, Hollywood Ending. Allen plays Val Waxman, a one-time cinematic genius who's resorted to taking advertisement work to pay the bills for himself and his airhead live-in girlfriend, Lori (Debra Messing). Val finds his luck is about to change, however, when he receives the script for The City Never Sleeps, a period noir set against the backdrop of 1940s New York City. It seems his ex-wife, Ellie (Tea Leoni), now an executive at Galaxy Pictures, has been pulling for him to direct the picture, claiming he's the only man who can do justice to the script. She even manages to convince her boyfriend, Hal (Treat Williams), Galaxy's high-powered studio head, to take a chance on Val's "unique vision." Just when the cameras are ready to roll, however, Val finds that unique vision in jeopardy -- literally -- as he's struck with a psychosomatic case of blindness. When physicians and psychiatrists fail to cure him, Val contrives a scheme to forge ahead with the picture, for fear of blowing his one last chance at greatness. Hollywood Ending co-stars George Hamilton and Mark Rydell(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Renée Zellweger, Colin Firth and Hugh Grant return for this must-see sequel. Charming but insecure Bridget has finally landed the reserved Mr. Darcy (Firth), but she is concerned that their relationship won't last. Adding to her worries is the fact that her new employers have paired her with her womanizing ex-boyfriend, Daniel Cleaver (Grant)(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: Brett Ratner's martial-arts action-comedy sequel starring Chris Tucker and Jackie Chan. When the Chinese Ambassador to the US is shot while in the act of divulging the whereabouts of a major Triad leader, the American authorities once more send Chief Inspector Lee and Detective James Carter into the fray. Lee quickly corners the would-be assassin, Kenji, but the shock of coming face-to-face with an old friend gives the baddie just enough time to escape. Kenji's trail leads the mismatched cops to Paris, where car chases and a sequence among the under-dressed dancers of the Folies Bergère await them, plus rather a lot of dodgy French stereotypes and a finale atop the Eiffel Tower(n)

programme.title: Mafia!
programme.desc: Packed to the gills with references to mob movies from The Godfather to Casino, the story of an Italian boy who comes to America and becomes entangled with the all-powerful Mafia provides on opportunity for director Jim Abrahams to poke fun at the genre in his distinctive gag-a-minute style using everything from visual puns to verbal acrobatics in his quest to raise a laugh. The gags come thick and fast in this Mafia spoof from the makers of Airplane! and The Naked Gun(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Two straight-laced friends pose as drug dealers and try their best -- and sometimes fail -- to fit in with the thug circle in order to retrieve a stolen kitten(n)

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: Drama, starring Fardeen Khan, Eesha Deol, Jugal Hansraj, Kiron Kher, Perizaad Zorabian, Satish Shah and others(n)

programme.title: Be Kind Rewind
programme.desc: When a bumbling movie lover becomes magnetized while attempting to sabotage a local power plant and accidentally erases all of the videotapes in the small video store where his best friend works, the pair attempt to keep the store's loyal customer base by remaking as many of the top-renting movies as possible. Mike (Mos Def) is an employee at Be Kind Rewind, a modest mom and pop video store that is owned by Mr. Fletcher (Danny Glover). Mike's best friend Jerry (Jack Black) works in an auto garage/junkyard directly adjacent to a local power plant. Lately Jerry has become increasingly paranoid about the effects that the power plant is having on his health. Convinced that he has developed a brain tumor from working in such close proximity to the power plant, Jerry attempts to sabotage the plant. Unfortunately for Jerry, his brain is magnetized in the process. The next time Jerry goes to visit Mike at Be Kind Rewind, the powerful magnetization emanating from his brain erases every videotape in the store. Now the only way for Mike and Jerry to be sure that Be Kind Rewind stays in business is to remake every film on the shelves before the customers notice. But when word gets out that Mike and Jerry have remade such Hollywood classics as Back to the Future, Robocop, The Lion King, and Rush Hour without permission, the store is threatened with copyright violations and forced to close its doors. In the aftermath of the closing, Mr. Fletcher and his employees discover just how loyal their customers really are when the entire neighborhood pools their resources to transform the junkyard into a legitimate movie studio and produce an entirely original film detailing the incredible adventures of a local jazz legend(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: Brett Ratner's martial-arts action-comedy sequel starring Chris Tucker and Jackie Chan. When the Chinese Ambassador to the US is shot while in the act of divulging the whereabouts of a major Triad leader, the American authorities once more send Chief Inspector Lee and Detective James Carter into the fray. Lee quickly corners the would-be assassin, Kenji, but the shock of coming face-to-face with an old friend gives the baddie just enough time to escape. Kenji's trail leads the mismatched cops to Paris, where car chases and a sequence among the under-dressed dancers of the Folies Bergère await them, plus rather a lot of dodgy French stereotypes and a finale atop the Eiffel Tower(n)

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: Deciding against retirement, Satan angers two of his ambitious sons who had been hoping to take over the family business. When they travel to Earth to collect sufficient souls with which to overthrow their father, Satan sends his third son - who unfortunately doesn't seem to have an evil bone in his body - to bring them back(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Two straight-laced friends pose as drug dealers and try their best -- and sometimes fail -- to fit in with the thug circle in order to retrieve a stolen kitten(n)

programme.title: Search Party
programme.desc: Distraught over the realisation that they scared away their best friend's fiancée, hard-partying pals Evan and Jason set out on a wild journey to reunite the estranged couple by any means necessary(n)

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: Spring break gets totally wild when thirtysomething friends Gayle (Amy Poehler), Becky (Parker Posey) and Judi (Rachel Dratch) go vacationing at a popular resort frequented by college coeds in order to prevent a politician's daughter from embarrassing her family(n)

programme.title: The Winning Season
programme.desc: In this touching comedy-drama, an alcoholic named Bill (Sam Rockwell) seeks redemption by coaching his daughter's high-school basketball team after his drinking problem squandered a career in the NBA. Directed by James C. Strouse(n)

programme.title: Making of 'My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2'
programme.desc: A look at "My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2," a 2016 sequel to the 2002 hit that follows the Portokalos clan as they celebrate another momentous walk down the aisle. The film stars Nia Vardalos, John Corbett, Lainie Kazan and Michael Constantine, and is directed by Kirk Jones(n)

programme.title: Bushwhacked
programme.desc: Luckless Max Grabelski is set up for a murder he did not commit. On the run, he camps out in the same forest as a scout group. Will the ankle-biters rumble the towny in his leather jacket and loafers, or will Max tame the wilds? Slapstick(n)

programme.title: The World According to Garp
programme.desc: The life of T S Garp, and his mother, Jenny. Whilst Garp sees himself as a serious writer, Jenny writes a feminist manifesto at an opportune time, and finds herself as a magnet for all manner of distressed women(n)

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Gag-meister Jerry Zucker's cracking comedy has a cast to die for. Las Vegas casino owner Donald P Sinclair decides to set up a special event for his highest rollers. Lucky tokens in his slot machines entitle six punters to enter a race across America with $2million as the prize. He'll make a killing on the bets placed on the players while the contestants dash for the cash(n)

programme.title: The Good Guy
programme.desc: After executive producing the acclaimed documentary Manda Bala and the J.M. Coetzee adaptation Disgrace, Julio DePietro makes his feature debut as a writer-director with The Good Guy, a drama about ambitious young Wall Streeters fighting each other -- and sometimes their own decent nature -- to get ahead in the world. Our narrator, Tommy (Scott Porter of TV's Friday Night Lights), is young, clever, charming, and attractive. He's got a smart, pretty girlfriend, Beth (Alexis Bledel of Gilmore Girls), an urban conservationist. He's also very good at his investment broker job, impressing his ruthless, cynical boss, Cash (erstwhile "Brat Pack" member Andrew McCarthy). When a key member of Tommy's sales team suddenly leaves for a competitor, Tommy needs to fill his spot quickly, and takes a chance on the bumbling Daniel (Bryan Greenberg, Bride Wars), a former Marine and computer geek who seems a bit naïve about high finance and a bit nervous around women. Tommy takes Daniel under his wing, showing him how to dress, where to socialize, and how to charm attractive women. Their relationship is threatened when Daniel begins spending more time with Beth, joining her book club, and becoming her confidant. Tommy begins to question his decision to share his wisdom with Daniel, while Daniel is forced to decide what success really means to him, and where his loyalties lie. The Good Guy also stars Anna Chlumsky (In the Loop) and Aaron Yoo (Disturbia). The film had its world premiere at the 2009 Tribeca Film Festival(n)

programme.title: I-Spy
programme.desc: The film revolves around a special stealth fighter jet that has gone missing. A spy named Alex Scott is asked to work on the case and he must team up with a boxing champion Kelly Robinson to catch Arnold Gundars, a dangerous illegal arms dealers(n)

programme.title: Michael
programme.desc: Unshaven, chain-smoking archangel Michael is discovered in an elderly woman's home by a group of cynical tabloid reporters, who resolve to prove his existence to the world. Their cross-country journey becomes a quest for both redemption and love(n)

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A girl's sixteenth birthday is forgotten by her family who are distracted by the upcoming wedding of her older sister, and to compound things, she has a crush on a popular older classmate and is suffering the unwanted attentions of a sophomoric geek(n)

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: Director Amy Heckerling's hilarious teen movie follows brother and sister Brad and Stacy through a world of dead-end jobs, uninspiring classes, borrowed cars and sexual anxiety. Sean Penn is unforgettable as a stoned surfer(n)

programme.title: Harold & Kumar Escape From Guantanamo Bay
programme.desc: Friends Harold and Kumar decide to take a trip to Amsterdam when Harold finds out that his beloved Maria is heading to the city. After a few incidents at the airport, they finally get on the plane, but once again create more trouble when Kumar lights up his new bong and the air marshals think it's a bomb. Next stop: Guantanamo Bay prison, in Cuba. And the problems have just started..(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Two hard-partying ladies see a viral video in which unruly brothers plead for dates for their sister's wedding in Hawaii, and decide to pose as the angels they're looking for in order to score a free trip(n)

programme.desc: A girl's sixteenth birthday is forgotten by her family who are distracted by the upcoming wedding of her older sister, and to compound things, she has a crush on a popular older classmate and is suffering the unwanted attentions of a sophomoric geek(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the 2002 sleeper hit My Big Fat Greek Wedding, Toula (Nia Vardalos) finds her extended family rocked by the revelation that her mother and father were never really married -- which, of course, requires an even bigger Greek wedding so they can officially tie the knot. Meanwhile, Toula struggles to spice up her marriage to Ian (John Corbett), and is heartbroken when her daughter Paris (Elena Kampouris) says she wants to go to a distant college in order to get away from her overbearing clan(n)

programme.title: The Music In Me: A Family Special

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: There are chills and thrills galore in this inspiring fact-based adventure yarn about eight sled dogs struggling to survive after bad weather leaves them marooned at an Antarctic research station. The fact-based film is similar to the 1983 Japanese film "Nankyoku Monogatari," which was released in the U.S. as "Antarctica."(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
programme.desc: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance a mystical lion(n)

programme.title: Space Chimps
programme.desc: In Kirk DeMicco's animated film three supersonic simian spacemen take to the cosmos to find a missing probe, and encounter a whole world of trouble along the way. Ham III, the grandson of the first ever chimp in space, is a wise-cracking smart aleck who makes a living being fired from a cannon. When the Infinity Space Probe goes missing, Ham joins a mission to find it. He's been recruited as a PR stunt, but his fellow Space Chimps, Luna and Titan, are highly trained experts. When they crash-land on the planet Malgor, they find a race of aliens who are being oppressed by the tyrannical Zartog, who is using the probe for his own nefarious ends. Can the feckless Ham use his circus skills to save the day, help liberate the aliens, recover the probe, get the girl, and find a way to get back home? This is great fare for all the family, with plenty of deadpan asides to keep grown-ups entertained(n)

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: Hilarous comedy sequel in which nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier is asked to impersonate a nun once more. Her old friends at St Catherine's Convent are having difficulty controlling a school filled with juvenile delinquents. But convincing everyone that Deloris is a nun is going to be a challenge in itself, especially with a group of incompetent monks trying to hinder their efforts(n)

programme.title: A Kid in King Arthur's Court
programme.desc: An earthquake magically transports a modern-day youngster to the time of King Arthur's court in this loose take on an oft-adapted Mark Twain story. Once in medieval times, the lad wows the Knights of the Round Table with modern technology and courts a beautiful young princess(n)

programme.title: Lorenzo's Oil
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a couple who battle against all the odds to save their young son from a terrible wasting disease. Lorenzo is expected to die within two years, but his parents refuse to give up the search for a cure and teach themselves about the condition from research papers and text books while nursing Lorenzo round the clock. Finally, the husband presents a sceptical medical establishment with a possible therapy(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Huntsman: Winter's War'
programme.desc: A look at "The Huntsman: Winter's War," a 2016 prequel to "Snow White and the Huntsman" that follows the Huntsman and his secret lover Sara as they attempt to stop Freya the Ice Queen and her evil sister from conquering the forest. The film stars Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron and Emily Blunt, and is directed by Cedric Nicolas-Troyan(n)

One day, Margalo is nowhere to be found, so Stuart and Snowbell set out across the city to find her(n)

This time, the agents are on the trail of a sexy extraterrestrial (Lara Flynn Boyle) determined to destroy the world. Rip Torn, Tony Shalhoub, Johnny Knoxville, Rosario Dawson(n)

programme.title: The Sweetest Thing
programme.desc: Former South Park writer and Win Ben Stein's Money sidekick Nancy Pimental makes her feature screenwriting debut with this relationship comedy. Cameron Diaz stars as Christina Walters, a jaded, club-hopping single woman in Boston who has given up trying to find the perfect mate to focus on "Mr. Right Now." Her equally cynical friend, Courtney (Christina Applegate), a divorce attorney, shares much the same attitude. Christina's life changes forever one evening at a nightclub where she meets Peter Donahue (Thomas Jane), a man she finds adorable and just about perfect. Unfortunately, Peter disappears and all she knows about him is that his brother, Roger (Jason Bateman), is getting married soon and having a bachelor party nearby. When crashing the party doesn't pan out, Courtney suggests they road trip to the wedding and Christina agrees, leading to encounters with a series of obstacles, including some funky leftovers and an insane bank security guard. The Sweetest Thing co-stars Parker Posey and Selma Blair(n)

When he learns that that the unscrupulous president of his sometime employer, Aegis Oil, proposes to commence drilling on native Inuit land in Alaska, the cooly efficient troubleshooter joins forces with the local people to block the plans. Martial arts star Steven Seagal's directorial debute(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: This exhilarating spin-off of "Snow White and the Huntsman" acts as both prequel and sequel to the original film, detailing the adventures of Eric the Huntsman as he gets caught up in the rivalry between wicked queens Ravenna and Freya. programme.title: The Order
programme.desc: Brian Helgeland's religious thriller stars Heath Ledger as Alex Bernier, a young Catholic priest who adheres to a rare form of the faith. When he learns of the strange death of his mentor, he travels to Rome with his fellow priest Thomas Garrett and savant Mara Sinclair - a woman who once tried to kill him during an exorcism - to investigate the mystery. Brian Helgeland's religious thriller stars Heath Ledger as Alex Bernier, a young Catholic priest who adheres to a rare form of the faith. When he learns of the strange death of his mentor, he travels to Rome with his fellow priest Thomas Garrett and savant Mara Sinclair - a woman who once tried to kill him during an exorcism - to investigate the mystery. What he finds is the truth behind the myth of the Sin Eater, an immortal figure who takes on the sins of the damned to ensure their passage into Heaven. But with immortality comes both spiritual and temporal corruption, as Bernier battles both the church and demons to uncover the secrets of the Sin Eater. The film reunited the director with the stars of his film A Knight's Tale and also stars Benno Fürmann and Peter Weller(n)

programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this portrait of airline pilot Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger, which depicts his successful emergency landing of an Airbus A320 on the Hudson River in January 2009. In the aftermath of this unprecedented and heroic feat, the traumatized pilot must endure second-guessing by investigators, the weight of sudden fame, and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day. Anna Gunn, Laura Linney, and Aaron Eckhart co-star. Directed by Clint Eastwood(n)

Chris Murphy (D-Conn.)(n)

By day, chilling ritualistic figures are discovered nearby. As the end of their journey approaches, they realize that what they are filming now is not a legend...but their own descent into unimaginable horror(n)

programme.title: Se7en
programme.desc: Dark thriller about a pair of cops on the trail of a serial killer whose murders each relate to one of the Seven Deadly Sins. Brad Pitt stars as Detective David Mills who, with his seasoned partner Detective William Somerset (Morgan Freeman), investigates a sociopath nicknamed 'John Doe'. Their suspect is leaving a trail of bodies in his wake, each one killed in a manner representing one of the Deadly Sins - Gluttony, Greed, Sloth, and so on - but as the two detectives build a picture of John Doe's motivations they realise that his killings form a sermon which is aimed directly at them. Gwyneth Paltrow co-stars as Mills' wife(n)

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Anna attacks a faith healer's controversial methods, especially when a youngster with arthritis refuses conventional treatment, and Simon comes under increasing pressure from a hotshot Canadian businessman who makes a shocking takeover bid for his company. Meanwhile, Beth moves in with Vic and Lucy, and Henry gets the sympathy vote from Jess - but will she find out he's been faking his symptoms?.(n)

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: Danny is in prison, accused of murdering Peeters, but Du Plessis sets out to prove his friend's innocence - whatever the cost. With nobody around to help her, Rosie goes on a lone search for a wild cheetah, leading her into a dangerous situation.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Real-life small-claims cases on issues affecting family life, presided over by outspoken former New York judge Judy Sheindlin.(n)

programme.title: Wild at Heart

However, Du Plessis grows suspicious and fears the newcomer has an ulterior motive. Meanwhile, Fatani struggles while helping Liv and Thabo with the animal census.(n)

programme.title: You're Only Young Twice

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: Stan's plans for a romantic day at home are thwarted by Arthur's ramshackle motorbike, which unexpectedly breaks down on him. Comedy, with Reg Varney.(n)

programme.title: The Street
programme.desc: New resident Paul Billerton, who works as a gardener in the local parks, takes a shine to local girl Kirsty. One morning he plucks up the courage to ask her on a date and an awkward relationship begins. However, Paul confides in Kirsty he is carrying a terrible secret he cannot share, which eventually leads him to the brink of self-destruction. With Robyn Addison and Jodhi May. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: UK
programme.desc: Brooks and Devlin investigate the death of middle-class teenager Debbie Powell. They discover the victim had been living a secret life as a drugs mule, and was being led astray by local dealer Gerry Craig. The case has an emotional impact on Castle, who demands Steel and Phillips do everything in their power to bring the person responsible to justice. Bradley Walsh, Jamie Bamber and Bill Paterson star.(n)

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Part two of two. After another colleague is murdered, Tony is arrested as prime suspect. With time to ponder the ritualistic nature of the attacks, he finally finds a link with the prostitute killings. Alex refuses to let him offer himself as bait to lure the perpetrator into the open - not realising he is already a target. Thriller based on the novels by Val McDermid, starring Robson Green, with Simone Lahbib and Mark Letheren.(n)

programme.title: Life of Crime
programme.desc: It's 1997, 12 years on from the Amy Reid investigation, and Denise's world is turned upside down when a forensic discovery in a new case casts doubt on the conviction of Mike Holland for the teenager's murder. As a result, his legal team presses for his release and the police officer is forced to admit to Ray that she planted evidence back in 1985. Then, a trial for Holland's financial compensation threatens to destroy her professional reputation, and to make matters worse, her husband asks for a separation. Drama, starring Hayley Atwell, Richard Coyle and Con O'Neill.(n)

programme.title: Prime Suspect
programme.sub-title: Prime Suspect V: Errors of Judgement - Part Two.
programme.desc: Conclusion. Having seen her error of judgement cost a young boy his life, Tennison must use all her ingenuity to trap the man she believes is responsible - but firm evidence continues to elude her. Helen Mirren stars.(n)

programme.title: Mr Selfridge
programme.desc: Author and spiritualist Arthur Conan Doyle is in Selfridges for a Sherlock Holmes book signing when he persuades Harry to hold a seance in the store - and the results of the gathering force the retail magnate to have a long-overdue heart-to-heart with Lois. Meanwhile, Agnes is transferred to women's fashion, Doris resolves to help an old friend, Miss Mardle is still agonising over Mr Grove, and Kitty has a secret admirer. Guest starring John Sessions, with Jeremy Piven, Kika Markham and Aisling Loftus.(n)

programme.title: Davina McCall: Life at the Extreme
programme.desc: Davina travels to the Azores in the mid-Atlantic to investigate how animals cope with with atmospheric pressure changes underwater, particularly the ones that have to take in air before they submerge. She swims with a school of dolphins and finds out about the inbuilt response that both animals and humans have when they go underwater, and meets a world champion freediver who teaches her the techniques needed to swim alongside sperm whales, before trying to overcome her nerves and dive down to the ocean floor on a single breath.(n)

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: George buys a pair of homing pigeons with which to annoy his next door neighbours, after Mildred accidentally flushes his beloved goldfish down the sink. Brian Murphy stars.(n)

Black comedy fantasy, starring Goldie Hawn, Meryl Streep, Bruce Willis and Isabella Rossellini.(n)

Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Louis Zorich and Patrick McGoohan, who also directed.(n)

Drama, starring Jack Shepherd, Helen Masters, Lynn Farleigh, Christian Solimeno and Paul Venables.(n)

programme.desc: Hathaway and Lewis struggle to determine whether a death during a college-based clinical trial for a new antidepressant was murder or suicide, and receive little assistance from the institution's evasive psychiatric professor. A second student's demise then leads to the revelation that the trial's participants are all operating under the influence of a mind-altering drug, and that the lines between love, obsession and madness have become dangerously blurred. Guest starring Douglas Henshall (Primeval), Lucy Liemann (Rev) and Thomas Brodie Sangster (Love Actually).(n)

programme.sub-title: A Pocket Full of Rye - Parts One & Two.
programme.desc: When a business magnate, his wife and their maid are murdered, Miss Marple (Julia McKenzie) is prompted by the circumstances surrounding the incidents to recall the nursery rhyme Sing a Song of Sixpence. She discovers the victims were part of a family tainted by secrets, and as she ponders the significance of the tune, a past scandal reveals itself. Murder mystery, featuring Wendy Richard as feisty cook Mrs Crump, in her final dramatic role. Other guest stars include Prunella Scales, Matthew Macfadyen, Ralf Little, Rupert Graves and Helen Baxendale.(n)

programme.desc: A man caught transporting illegal immigrants panics and holds staff hostage in a bid to avoid any police involvement. programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A guest at a village Halloween party boasts of having witnessed a murder years previously - and later meets a grisly end in keeping with the macabre spirit of the occasion. Arriving to investigate, Poirot delves back into the annals of local life - and uncovers a series of mysterious deaths, any one of which could have a bearing on the present case. David Suchet, Amelia Bullmore and Zoe Wanamaker star.(n)

programme.sub-title: To Burn in Every Drop of Blood - Part One.

However, Banks has a theory of his own. Crime drama, starring Stephen Tompkinson.(n)

programme.title: DCI Banks
programme.sub-title: To Burn in Every Drop of Blood - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. When a woman commits suicide, her grieving father relies on violence to procure answers as he investigates his daughter's death. She left a note confessing to Damon Horsley's murder, but Banks is suspicious, and his hunch is confirmed when it appears that the woman's death is not a simple suicide and someone else may have been involved. The pressure is on as the team gathers evidence and tries to solve two murders. Crime drama, starring Stephen Tompkinson, Andrea Lowe, Caroline Catz and Jack Deam.(n)

programme.desc: Ellie and Hardy bring a new suspect in for questioning and in a search of this suspect's premises, Ellie finds devastating new evidence linking him to the crime. The fact that Ian has taken a personal item of Trish's without her knowledge comes to light.(n)

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: Rachel promised the chaos of her personal life was all in the past, but she is conflicted upon discovering her mother's new boyfriend is a violent domestic abuser. Meanwhile, Janet gets cold feet when she goes on her first date, terrified at the idea of having to impress a stranger. The crimebusters are united in the search for the killer of Rich Hutchings, who is found murdered in the flat he shares with his husband Adam. Barry, their outspoken and violent homophobic neighbour, is the prime suspect. However, as Adam's friend Tim struggles to recall the events of their night out, it seems Barry may be in the clear. Meanwhile, Rachel is horrified when her mum Sharon turns up asking for help. Crime drama, starring Suranne Jones, Lesley Sharp and Danny Miller.(n)

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: As Syndicate 9 investigates the discovery of a woman's body in a Manchester hotel room, Gill introduces Rachel to high-flying DS Will Pemberton, unaware they are already well acquainted - they've been having a passionate, secret relationship for months. But while the volatile copper can be discreet when it comes to romance, will she be able to hide her feelings when Gill lets slip that she wasn't the first choice for the sergeant's job? Meanwhile, Janet is keen to give her own love life a boost, especially after seeing how happy Ade is with his new partner Eleanor. However, a speed-dating event might not be the best option, as Janet finds herself treating each brief encounter like a police interrogation. Crime drama, starring Suranne Jones, Lesley Sharp, Amelia Bullmore, Steve Touissant and Mina Anwar.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The Belgian sleuth is summoned when Colin Race is distracted from an investigation into a spy ring by the discovery of a murder victim surrounded by stopped clocks. The body was found at the home of blind former teacher Millicent Pebmarsh, but when a second death is reported, Poirot realises the man was killed elsewhere and brought to the scene, though the neighbours prove unhelpful eyewitnesses. Mystery, starring David Suchet, Anna Massey, Jaime Winstone, Lesley Sharp, Phil Daniels, Geoffrey Palmer and Tessa Peake-Jones.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Richard and Hazel open their doors to Belgian refugees while they await news of James, but a language barrier develops and the servants are unimpressed by the guests' ideas of cleanliness.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: A man caught transporting illegal immigrants panics and holds staff hostage in a bid to avoid any police involvement. Jack takes control of the situation, proving there's more to him than meets the eye, while Andrew is emotionally scarred by the experience. Elsewhere, Sam and Mike make no attempt to deny they're an item when everyone finds out they're sharing a flat. Medical drama, starring Martin Shaw and Niamh Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Cardale prepares for Andrew and Erica's wedding, but a health scare at the local old people's home tests everyone to the limit. Rural medical drama, starring Gary Mavers and Fiona Gillies.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: Robert feels Christine is keeping him at arm's length, while Cathy needs his shoulder to cry on after a weekend in London with Mike leaves her with mixed feelings about their on-off relationship. Jack encourages David to ask for a transfer to surgery, and Stuart makes it clear he wants nothing more to do with Louise. Medical drama, starring Martin Shaw, Niamh Cusack and Michael Kitchen.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone

Medical drama, starring Martin Shaw and Niamh Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Kavanagh QC

As if that were not a tough enough assignment, the redoubtable barrister also faces the task of convincing son Matt that failing his A levels is not the end of the world. John Thaw stars with his real-life wife Sheila Hancock, Josette Simon, Lisa Harrow and Tom Brodie.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A cleaner is found dead in her home and suspicion immediately falls upon her lodger, who is arrested and convicted of her murder. It appears to be an open-and-shut case, but Superintendent Spence begins to question the man's guilt and invites Poirot to help uncover the identity of the real killer. The Belgian sleuth teams up with crime writer Ariadne Oliver (My Family's Zoe Wanamaker) as he tries to crack the case. Whodunit, starring David Suchet, with Richard Hope, Joe Absolom, Amanda Root, Sian Phillips and Raquel Cassidy.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Schoolgirl Jennifer Sutcliffe becomes embroiled in a mystery when priceless jewels are hidden among her belongings. programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The detective investigates the discovery of a young man's body in an area notorious for illicit teenage gatherings, the corpse wrapped in plastic sheeting and having received a blow to the head. programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Su and Reg Roberts from south Wales first fell in love with Tobago 20 years ago and have been back every other year since. Now, with their children growing up and retirement approaching, they're ready to turn their dream of a holiday home on the island into a reality. Presenter Scarlette Douglas shows them five properties within their £310,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: With their children now leading independent lives, Kevin and Monique Dixon want to buy a holiday home on Florida's Gulf Coast, where they can enjoy the sailing and outdoor life as the UK winters begin back home. With £285,000 to spend, presenter Ben Hillman shows them five waterside homes.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Another selection of B&B owners take it in turns as hosts to decide which of their establishments provides the best value for money. The contest begins at Knockaloe Beg Farm on the Isle of Man, where owners Fiona and John Anderson hope their guests will embrace their green ethos. They kick things off with an afternoon of laser mayhem, and continue the fun the next day by following breakfast with hands-on animal antics.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The guests head to The Arches on the Isle of Man for their second stay, where owner Phil Routledge hopes to wow them with scenic views and scuba diving at the B&B's own pool. However, some of the owners are dismayed by modern gadgets with a lack of instructions, and even find cobwebs in their rooms.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants arrive at the Trafford in Blackpool, owned by Robbie and John Welling, who are proud of their traditional `bucket and spade' B&B. The guests are pleasantly surprised, even if previous host Phil is intent on finding dust as a bit of tit-for-tat retaliation, and the afternoon is spent learning the art of making sticks of rock.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Host Julie welcomes the contestants to Sheepy Lodge, Warwickshire, where they are shocked by their surroundings, and disappointed by a variety of things in the rooms. The host puts on some old-fashioned parlour games, before a fierce hide-and-seek contest erupts. At breakfast, Julie frets when she must prepare poached eggs, and is left emotional after the feedback.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The rival B&B owners meet to settle some scores and discover what they have been paid. Knockaloe Beg Farm owners Fiona and John Anderson tackle criticisms of a missing host at breakfast, and Phil Routledge from The Arches on the Isle of Man takes on Robbie and John Welling from The Trafford in Blackpool about their `forensic investigation'. After some heated discussion, the winner is announced.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: With their two daughters ready to leave home, adventurous Preston couple Geoff and Sally Taylor are looking to wind down and spend more quality time together. They fell in love with Costa Rica when they visited it on holiday and have decided to buy a holiday home on its Pacific Coast, so Ben Hillman shows the duo five properties in the region within their £300,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Ever since Jacqueline Priddin's parents moved to the Costa del Sol, she and husband Anthony have dreamt of also buying a place there for them and their daughter Izzy. Now they have decided to make that happen, so Ben Hillman shows them five homes in the inland area west of Malaga that suit their £50,000 budget. But will it be a town house or a rustic finca that wins them over?.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The archaeologists get an opportunity to dig at an army firing range in High Ham, Somerset, to investigate a set of Roman mosaics first discovered 150 years ago. Initial searches suggest the remains of Roman villas could be located on the site, and the team begins to build up a picture of the highs and lows of life in the society of the time - until the cold weather threatens to bring the excavation to a premature halt. Presented by Tony Robinson.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: The House of the White Queen.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team head to Groby Old Hall in Leicestershire, formerly the home of Edward IV's wife Elizabeth Woodville, and discover a surprising array of archaeological remains beneath its gardens, including a medieval wall and possible evidence of a Norman castle. They are joined by author Philippa Gregory, who delves into the complex history of the Greys, the house's former owners and one of the most powerful dynasties in medieval Britain.(n)

programme.title: Car SOS
programme.desc: Presenter Tim Shaw and mechanic Fuzz Townshend travel to Norfolk to help restore an ageing Ford Zodiac. They plan to help get its owner behind the wheel of his beloved motor for the first time in 20 years, but tensions rise when Fuzz opts to change the paintwork back to its original colour.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Pioneering veterinarian Dr Noel Fitzpatrick uses his talents to treat a puppy called Poppy, which has difficulties with walking, and a lurcher called Dylan needs help with a collapsed joint. The programme also features a one-year-old cat that was hit by a car on its first venture outside the house, leaving it requiring emergency treatment.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Jonathan Broom and his wife Deborah have put everything on hold while he pursues his dream of building a miniature Hollywood Hills-style mansion. They stumble across a scrap of land in north London, but it's fraught with problems and the only way they can complete the £1million home is by sinking half of it six metres below ground. Surrounded on all sides by their neighbours' back gardens, the couple have to dismantle walls and fences and promise to put them back together again, and that's just the start of their difficulties. Kevin McCloud follows their progress.(n)

programme.title: Dicte - Crime Reporter
programme.desc: Part two of two. All leads suggest the 12-year-old girl was kidnapped and Wagner - now investigating the case - suspects a couple of burglars of the crime. Dicte, on the other hand, single-handedly chases down clues that point towards a paedophile perpetrator who has been chatting with girls online. Can Dicte and Wagner find the youngster before it's too late? Meanwhile, Bo moves in with Dicte. Crime drama, starring Iben Hjejle and Lars Brygmann. In Danish.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Young parents Nicole and Stefian arrive in resus with their 19-month-old daughter Xah'Nae, who is unresponsive and has a high fever, and doctors fear she may have a life-threatening infection. Meanwhile, the team suspects 61-year-old Christine has suffered a second stroke in 10 years, and 52-year-old Graham, who has Down's syndrome, is brought into A&E by his sisters following an accident.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Bill, 92, arrives at King's with breathing difficulties and a swollen leg and test results suggest there may be something seriously wrong, while 25-year-old Sarah is finding it hard to stand up and has been brought in by her mum and grandfather. She has learning difficulties as a result of an inherited genetic disorder and doctors are concerned she may have suffered a stroke.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to Newbury Park in southern California to help Mexican restaurant Mama Rita's. The owner previously ran a successful catering company but has struggled to adapt her skills to meet the demands of a new business - and with a year's worth of food stored in the freezer Gordon realises he has a tough job ahead.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Young parents Nicole and Stefian arrive in resus with their 19-month-old daughter Xah'Nae, who is unresponsive and has a high fever, and doctors fear she may have a life-threatening infection. Meanwhile, the team suspects 61-year-old Christine has suffered a second stroke in 10 years, and 52-year-old Graham, who has Down's syndrome, is brought into A&E by his sisters following an accident.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Jonathan Broom and his wife Deborah have put everything on hold while he pursues his dream of building a miniature Hollywood Hills-style mansion. They stumble across a scrap of land in north London, but it's fraught with problems and the only way they can complete the £1million home is by sinking half of it six metres below ground. Surrounded on all sides by their neighbours' back gardens, the couple have to dismantle walls and fences and promise to put them back together again, and that's just the start of their difficulties. Kevin McCloud follows their progress.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Uncut
programme.desc: An extended edition of the irreverent panel show, hosted by Jimmy Carr. Team captains Jon Richardson and Sean Lock are joined by Joe Wilkinson, Ellie Taylor, Natalie Cassidy and Gabby Logan.(n)

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty visits Scotland to find out about a mysterious condition threatening salmon stocks, while Kate Quilton heads Down Under to learn about kangaroo farming and Matt Tebbutt goes behind the scenes of the annual race to get new season asparagus onto the nation's supermarket shelves.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: A recently married couple seek to mark the next chapter of their lives by buying a holiday apartment together in Fuerteventura, one of Spain's Canary Islands. Jean and Stuart Knight are planning to spend several weeks there every year both on their own and also with family and friends. Ben Hillman shows the pair five options within their budget of £60,000.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton helps Tim and Irene Foster find a property on the Cape Peninsula with a budget of £240,000. Irene comes from Cape Town and dreams of seeing her family more often.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jerry and Christine Steele's love of South Africa began decades ago and they have decided to spend part of their retirement in a second home among the beaches and national parks of the Garden Route stretch of the south-eastern coast. For their budget of £60,000, Laura Hamilton shows them five great value properties.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton helps nurses Philip Vaux and Alec Billen from Somerset search for a holiday home in Almeria, south Spain, showing them properties from a townhouse to a country pad.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Marketing manager Clair Sherwood-Parkin hosts the first party in Darlington, Co Durham, hoping to impress with a Moroccan-inspired feast. However, one guest causes a stir when she introduces herself as the Queen of Sheba, and Clair's party game unearths some shocking truths about her diners.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Veterinary surgeon James Emson hosts the second party in Darlington, Co Durham, and decides to accompany his curry main course with a gruesome contest in which he serves up a selection of eyeballs, tongues and other bits of offal, then challenges his guests to identify which animal they came from. Diner Barry l'Anson also manages to leave the party having achieved a lifetime ambition.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Barry l'Anson hosts the third dinner party in Darlington, Co Durham, and hopes his love-themed evening will endear him to his guests. Unfortunately for him Clair Sherwood-Parkin is not impressed and begins doubting the host's masculinity, and vet James Emson is concerned what the dessert will be like. Charlotte Langley finds herself wanting a sick bag before the evening is over, and Eseyoma Sodje steals the show during some cringe-worthy entertainment.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Charlotte Langley hosts the fourth dinner party in Darlington, Co Durham, and asks her guests to attend dressed as their favourite red-carpet celebrity, but as the night progresses, she discovers she is not very good at taking criticism and a tense situation threatens to get out of hand.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Eseyoma Sodje hosts the final dinner party in Darlington, Co Durham, hoping her Nigerian recipes and a hint of glamour will impress her guests. To further improve her chances of bagging the £1,000 prize, she puts on a round of hip-hop karaoke, before the winner is announced.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Euro 2017 Live
programme.sub-title: UEFA Women's Euro 2017: Netherlands v Sweden.
programme.desc: Netherlands v Sweden (Kick-off 5.00pm). Coverage of the opening quarter-final match, which takes place at Stadion De Vijverberg in Doetinchem, the Netherlands. The Dutch emerged from Group A with a 100 per cent record, so will fancy their chances against a Swedish side who have struggled to impress in this tournament so far. However, the head-to-head record between the two teams from their last six matches is evenly poised at two wins apiece. Subsequent programmes are subject to change.(n)

programme.title: The Yorkshire Dales and the Lakes
programme.desc: In Swaledale, mountain rescuer Pete Roe is called to Tan Hill Inn, Britain's highest pub, where a man has gone missing in freezing overnight temperatures.(n)

programme.title: Spying on the Royals
programme.desc: The conclusion of the two-part documentary about surveillance on Edward VIII and Wallis Simpson. In the wake of the abdication, the couple took a holiday in America, unaware they were being spied on by US intelligence agencies as well as British. The outbreak of the Second World War saw them move on to Lisbon, where their dealings with a known Nazi collaborator raised concerns for MI5.(n)

programme.title: The Royal House of Windsor
programme.desc: This second episode reveals how Elizabeth and her father George VI kept up appearances while crises loomed on every front. In 1947, as Britain suffered from crippling post-war austerity, the royal family set off on a tour of South Africa, but behind the smiles, the king felt the pressures of the strains of war, and anxiety about his eldest daughter. Four years after the family returned from their fraught tour, the king died, leaving a young, newly married Elizabeth to be thrust onto the throne.(n)

programme.title: Edward VIII's Murderous Mistress
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the story behind an affair Edward VIII is said to have had before becoming king and the repercussions when the woman involved later found herself in court facing the gallows. The programme investigates claims that there was a cover-up by the Establishment to protect the future king's reputation, as well as save the life of his supposed former mistress Marguerite Meller when she was charged with murdering her husband in 1923. Narrated by Rupert Penry-Jones.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy panel show's version of the words-and-numbers quiz, as Jon Richardson and Michelle Wolf take on guest captain Jonathan Ross with Johnny Vegas. Three-man comedy act Pappy's joins Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner and Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.(n)

programme.title: Last Call With Carson Daly
programme.desc: Jonah Ray; J.D. Dillard; Bonobo. Jonah Ray; J.D. Dillard. Also: Bonobo performs(n)

programme.title: Access Hollywood Live
programme.desc: 07-27-2017. Jason Alexander; Ian Ziering(n)

programme.title: Steve Harvey
programme.sub-title: Steve Helps a Funeral Director Find Love; Judge Lynn Toler Helps a Couple Decide If They Should Split; Clint Harp
programme.desc: Steve Helps a Funeral Director Find Love; Judge Lynn Toler Helps a Couple Decide If They Should Split; Clint Harp. programme.title: Kingdom of the Blue Whale
programme.desc: Supported by the National Geographic Society, the world's eminent blue whale scientists embark on a revolutionary mission: they'll find, identify and tag California blue whales, use the DNA samples to confirm the sex of individual whales - then rejoin the massive creatures' stunning migration when they collect at a chimera known as the Costa Rica Dome. These experts have observed, firsthand, courtship behaviour among the whales at the moving mass of krill and currents 500 miles off the coast of Costa Rica. programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated animated comedy adventure about a group of prehistoric animals who brave the elements to return a human baby to its father. Sid, a goofy and talkative sloth, wakes up to find that everyone's started to migrate south to avoid the onset of the Ice Age. Afraid of being deserted, he tags along with Manfred, an embittered mammoth who's decided he'd rather head north. After stumbling across a human camp that's under attack by a pride of sabre-toothed tigers and narrowly saving a baby, they're joined by Diego, a sabretooth who convinces them he can help return the child by tracking the humans. However, he's actually a member of the same pride - and is plotting to guide them into an ambush. Can Manny and Sid find the baby's father and avoid the frozen weather? Or will Diego's plan mean they never make it?(n)
